Target: 1This is the word that came to Jeremiah from theLord:

Source: 1Gée gə́ gogo Moyis deḛ gə Aaro̰ d’aw rɔ Parao̰’g d’aw d’ulá pana: Njesigənea̰ Ala lə Israɛlje lé pa bèe pana: Ya̰ dəwje lə neḛ ar dee d’aw dɔdilaloo’g mba ra naḭ gə́ wɔji dɔ neḛ.
Target: 1Afterward Moses and Aaron went to Pharaoh and said, “This is what theLord, the God of Israel, says: ‘Let my people go, so that they may hold a festival to me in the wilderness.’ ”

Source: 1Ma Pool, njekaḭkula lə Jeju Kristi gə goo torndu Ala, mba kam m’ila mber ndukun gə́ wɔji dɔ kisi gə́ dəwje d’a si ne kəmba loo gə́ d’ɔm na̰’d gə Jeju Kristi lé
Target: 1Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God, in keeping with the promise of life that is in Christ Jesus,

Source: 1See dəw gə́ dɔ naŋg nee lé kəmə ləa asəna gə ka̰ njerɔ bèe el wa.
Target: 1“Do not mortals have hard service on earth?

Source: 1Togə́bè ŋgakɔmje gə́ njémeendaje, né gə́ deḛ ɓar sí na̰’d gə mbəa lé ḭ dara bèe ndá maji kar sí ə̰jije tor Jeju meḛ sí’g, yeḛ gə́ to njekaḭkula gə́ gəd ləm, gə ŋgɔ-njekinjanéməs gə́ jeḛ j’un meḛ sí j’aree ləm tɔ.
Target: 1Therefore, holy brothers and sisters, who share in the heavenly calling, fix your thoughts on Jesus, whom we acknowledge as our apostle and high priest.

Source: 1Mee ndəa’g neelé Debora ɔs pa nee gə Barak, ŋgolə Abinoam lé na̰’d pana:
Target: 1On that day Deborah and Barak son of Abinoam sang this song:

Source: 1Pakɔs kḭ kaw tuga ne loo ɗao-ɗao gə́ tar.
Target: 1I lift up my eyes to you,

Source: 1Tɔɓəi ma m’oo kura gə́ dara ḭ dara ree naŋg nee. Nékɔr tarəw bwa-wəl gə́ ɔr duu to jia’g ləm, kúla lar gə́ boo to jia’g ləm tɔ.
Target: 1And I saw an angel coming down out of heaven, having the key to the Abyss and holding in his hand a great chain.

Source: 1Bèe ndá deḛ gə́ d’ɔm na̰’d gə Jeju Kristi lé ta kára kara wa dɔ dee ɓasinè el.
Target: 1Therefore, there is now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus,

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ pana: Mee ndəa’g neelé m’a to Ala lə gel-bɔje lə Israɛlje lai ndá deḛ kara d’a to koso-dəwje ləm tɔ.
Target: 1“At that time,” declares theLord, “I will be the God of all the families of Israel, and they will be my people.”

Source: 1Taje lə Jeremi, ŋgolə Hilkija, yeḛ to gə́ mbuna njékinjanéməsje gə́ Anatot mee ɓee gə́ Bḛjami.
Target: 1The words of Jeremiah son of Hilkiah, one of the priests at Anathoth in the territory of Benjamin.

Source: 1Bèe ndá ɓó lé seḭ undaje loo teḛje dan njé gə́ d’wəi’g gə Kristi na̰’d ndá saŋgje néje gə́ wɔji dɔ ɓee gə́ tar loo gə́ Kristi sí keneŋ dɔ jikɔl Ala’g lé#Pak 110.1.
Target: 1Since, then, you have been raised with Christ, set your hearts on things above, where Christ is, seated at the right hand of God.

Source: 1Gée gə́ gogo Jeju ɔr njékwakiláje gə́ raŋg rɔ-siri, wa dee joo-joo ula dee ar dee d’aw nea̰’g kédé mee ɓee-booje lai-lai ləm, gə mee looje lai-lai gə́ yeḛ nja a gə kaw keneŋ lé ləm tɔ.
Target: 1After this the Lord appointed seventy-two#10:1Some manuscriptsseventy; also in verse 17others and sent them two by two ahead of him to every town and place where he was about to go.

Source: 1Dɔ naŋg gə́ ŋgalə Jisəb d’iŋga gə goo nékwɔji lée gə́ to asəna gə téḛ bèe lé un kudee baa gə́ Jurdɛ̰ mbɔr Jeriko’g par gə́ mán gə́ Jeriko par gə́ bər. Rəw-nimee un goo dɔdilaloo gə́ ḭ Jeriko saar teḛ Betel par gə́ kaar mbal’g tɔ.
Target: 1The allotment for Joseph began at the Jordan, east of the springs of Jericho, and went up from there through the desert into the hill country of Bethel.

Source: 1Aa ooje ŋgaka Esawu gə́ to Edɔm lé.
Target: 1This is the account of the family line of Esau (that is, Edom).

Source: 1See na̰ ɓa ḭ Bosra ɓee-boo gə́ Edɔm’g
Target: 1Who is this coming from Edom,

Source: 1Gée gə́ gogo ndá deḛ ree d’ula Jisəb pana: Aa oo, bɔbije lé rəa tée. Togə́bè ɓa yeḛ ar ŋganeeje joo, Manasə gə Eprayim d’aw səa na̰’d.
Target: 1Some time later Joseph was told, “Your father is ill.” So he took his two sons Manasseh and Ephraim along with him.

Source: 1Ndɔ gə́ njekɔm’g rɔ-joo-giree-sɔ gə́ mee naḭ’g neelé Israɛlje mbo̰ dɔ na̰, deḛ d’ula kubu-kwa-ndòo rɔ dee’g ləm, tuga kor naŋg d’ɔm dɔ dee’g ləm tɔ ɓa d’ɔg ne meḛ dee ɓoo tɔ.
Target: 1On the twenty-fourth day of the same month, the Israelites gathered together, fasting and wearing sackcloth and putting dust on their heads.

Source: 1Seḭ gel-bɔje lə Israɛl, Ooje ta gə́ Njesigənea̰ ula sí!
Target: 1Hear what theLordsays to you, people of Israel.

Source: 1Jeju ḭ lée’g neelé ɔd aw gə́ ɓee-kojee’g. Njékwakiláje d’ɔm na̰ gée’g d’aw səa tɔ.
Target: 1Jesus left there and went to his hometown, accompanied by his disciples.

Source: 1Eprayimje d’aḭ dɔm gə taŋgɔm ləm,
Target: 1Ephraim feeds on the wind;

Source: 1Loo gə́ rudu néje neelé un ɗiao mba̰ ndá ŋgan-mbaije ree rɔm’g pana: Dəwje gə́ Israɛl ləm, gə njékinjanéməsje gə Ləbije ləm tɔ lé d’unda rɔ dee ɓəd mbuna dəw-mee-ɓeeje’g neelé el ləm, ndá deḛ ndaji ne néra deeje gə́ mina̰ gə́ to kḛji gə́ to néra Kana̰je ləm, gə Hetje ləm, gə Peresje ləm, gə Yebusje ləm, gə Amo̰je ləm, gə Moabje ləm, gə Ejiptəje ləma, gə Amɔrje ləm tɔ.
Target: 1After these things had been done, the leaders came to me and said, “The people of Israel, including the priests and the Levites, have not kept themselves separate from the neighboring peoples with their detestable practices, like those of the Canaanites, Hittites, Perizzites, Jebusites, Ammonites, Moabites, Egyptians and Amorites.

Source: 1Togə́bè mbai a ko̰ɓee gə néra gə́ gə dɔ najee ləm,
Target: 1See, a king will reign in righteousness

Source: 1Ndil Mbaidɔmbaije gə́ Njesigənea̰ dəb dɔm’g,
Target: 1The Spirit of the SovereignLordis on me,

Source: 1Dabid tən njérɔje gə́ d’aw səa na̰’d lé ndá yeḛ unda njékaa dɔ mar deeje gə́ tɔl-dɔg-dɔg (1.000) ləm, gə njékaa dɔ njé gə́ tɔl-tɔl (100) ləm tɔ.
Target: 1David mustered the men who were with him and appointed over them commanders of thousands and commanders of hundreds.

Source: 1Piɛrə gə Ja̰ d’isi d’aw na̰’d mee kəi-Ala’g, to kàr ra tamaji gə́ kàr tel rəa gə mbɔree lé.
Target: 1One day Peter and John were going up to the temple at the time of prayer—at three in the afternoon.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ulam ta gə rɔtaje nee pana:
Target: 1The word of theLordcame to me:

Source: 1Loo gə́ Akab wəi mba̰ ndá Moabje d’ḭ d’ɔs Israɛlje rəw.
Target: 1After Ahab’s death, Moab rebelled against Israel.

Source: 1Wah! ji Njesigənea̰ na tas
Target: 1Surely the arm of theLordis not too short to save,

Source: 1Dabid gə ɓé-njérɔje d’ɔr njé gə́ na̰je mbuna ŋgalə Asap’g, gə Heman’g, gə Jedutun’g, d’unda dee gə kəmee mbata kula lé deḛ gə́ tegginta gə kṵdu-kagje gə kṵdu-ko̰déje gə ma̰dje gə́ sa səgə-səgə tɔ. Aa ooje, bula lə deḛ gə́ d’ɔm kula neelé ji dee’g lé ɓa nee:
Target: 1David, together with the commanders of the army, set apart some of the sons of Asaph, Heman and Jeduthun for the ministry of prophesying, accompanied by harps, lyres and cymbals. Here is the list of the men who performed this service:

Source: 1Ma m’ndəji sí mba kar sí tɔsje kəm sí dɔ Poebé, kɔnan sí gə́ dené gə́ to kura lə Eglisə gə́ Sa̰kre,
Target: 1I commend to you our sister Phoebe, a deacon#16:1Orservant#16:1The worddeaconrefers here to a Christian designated to serve with the overseers/elders of the church in a variety of ways; similarly in Phil. 1:1 and 1 Tim. 3:8,12.of the church in Cenchreae.

Source: 1Ginkoji Manasə lé iŋga loo kára gə goo nékwɔji lée gə́ to asəna gə téḛ bèe mbata yeḛ to ŋgondər Jisəb. Makir gə́ to ŋgondər Manasə, gə́ to bɔ Galaadje lé iŋga Galaad gə Basan to mbata yeḛ lé to bao-rɔ.
Target: 1This was the allotment for the tribe of Manasseh as Joseph’s firstborn, that is, for Makir, Manasseh’s firstborn. Makir was the ancestor of the Gileadites, who had received Gilead and Bashan because the Makirites were great soldiers.

Source: 1An ra tamaji pana:
Target: 1Then Hannah prayed and said:

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Noe pana: I gə njémeekəije ləi lai, a̰dje mee kəi-kag’d. Mbata m’ooi gə́ njemeekarabasur nɔm’g mbuna njé gə́ d’isi dɔ naŋg nee ɓasinè lé.
Target: 1TheLordthen said to Noah, “Go into the ark, you and your whole family, because I have found you righteous in this generation.

Source: 1Ndərta gə́ Njesigənea̰ pa ar Israɛlje gə ndu Malasi.
Target: 1A prophecy: The word of theLordto Israel through Malachi.#1:1Malachimeansmy messenger.

Source: 1Aa ooje, taje gə́ Moyis ula Israɛlje lai kel tura-baa gə́ Jurdɛ̰ gə́ nu dɔdilaloo’g, mee ndag-loo’d gə́ wɔji dɔ Sup njoroŋ mbuna Paran gə Topel’g, gə Laban gə Haserot’g, gə Di-Jahab’g tɔ.
Target: 1These are the words Moses spoke to all Israel in the wilderness east of the Jordan—that is, in the Arabah—opposite Suph, between Paran and Tophel, Laban, Hazeroth and Dizahab.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis pana#Tr 35.4-9:
Target: 1TheLordsaid to Moses,

Source: 1Mee ndɔ gə́ dɔtar gə́ mee naḭ gə́ njekɔm’g munda mee ləb gə́ njekɔm’g dɔg-giree-kára lé Njesigənea̰ ulam ta gə rɔtaje nee pana:
Target: 1In the eleventh year, in the third month on the first day, the word of theLordcame to me:

Source: 1Loo gə́ Jeju unda loo teḛ mee kəi-Ala’g ndá njékwakiláje rəm pər gə́ rəa’g mba tɔjee karee aa loo oo kəi gə́ ra neelé.
Target: 1Jesus left the temple and was walking away when his disciples came up to him to call his attention to its buildings.

Source: 1Loo gə́ ginkoji Israɛlje lai gaŋg baa gə́ Jurdɛ̰ mba̰ ndá Njesigənea̰ ula Juje pana:
Target: 1When the whole nation had finished crossing the Jordan, theLordsaid to Joshua,

Source: 1Tɔɓəi kura gə́ dara kára mbuna deḛ gə́ siri gə́ d’aar gə bai gə́ siri ji dee’g lé ulam ta pana: Maji kari gə́ ree, m’a kari oo rəwta-gaŋg gə́ d’a gə gaŋg dɔ kaiya-dené’g yeḛ gə́ nérea to ɓəl kədm-kədm gə́ si dɔ mán baa-boo’g lé#Jer 51.13.
Target: 1One of the seven angels who had the seven bowls came and said to me, “Come, I will show you the punishment of the great prostitute, who sits by many waters.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis pana:
Target: 1TheLordsaid to Moses,

Source: 1Pa lə Dabid gə́ ar bao-pa mba karee ɔs sə dee lé#Rɔm 3.10-12.
Target: 1The fool#14:1The Hebrew words renderedfoolin Psalms denote one who is morally deficient.says in his heart,

Source: 1Ndɔ ra naḭ Pag gə́ muru gə́ nétiee godo keneŋ lé nai dəb.
Target: 1Now the Festival of Unleavened Bread, called the Passover, was approaching,

Source: 1Lée neelé dəw gə́ njemeeyèr kára si keneŋ ria lə Seba, ŋgolə Bikri, dəw gə́ Bḛjami. Yeḛ lé im to̰to̰ ndá yeḛ pana:
Target: 1Now a troublemaker named Sheba son of Bikri, a Benjamite, happened to be there. He sounded the trumpet and shouted,

Source: 1Tɔɓəi barkəmrɔ Isai a kidi dɔ jigee’g ləm,
Target: 1A shoot will come up from the stump of Jesse;

Source: 1Yeḛ ula dee tɔɓəi pana: Ma m’ula sí təsərə, njé gə́ na̰je gə́ d’aar neelé d’a kwəi el nja saar njena d’a koo ɓeeko̰ lə Ala gə́ a ree gə siŋgamoŋ lé gə kəm dee ya.
Target: 1And he said to them,“Truly I tell you, some who are standing here will not taste death before they see that the kingdom of God has come with power.”

Source: 1Seḭ Bḛjamije, undaje loo teḛje
Target: 1“Flee for safety, people of Benjamin!

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ulam ta gə rɔtaje nee pana:
Target: 1The word of theLordcame to me:

Source: 1Bèe ndá ma m’pana: See Ala unda dəwje ləa ɓad wa. Wah! bèe el! Mbata ma nja kara m’to gə́ Israɛl ləm, m’to gə́ ŋgoka Abrakam ləma, m’to gə́ ginkoji lə Bḛjami ləm tɔ#Plb 3.5.
Target: 1I ask then: Did God reject his people? By no means! I am an Israelite myself, a descendant of Abraham, from the tribe of Benjamin.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis pana: Ḭje loo gə́ nee’g, awje, seḭ gə dəwje gə́ i ar dee d’unda loo mee ɓee gə́ Ejiptə teḛ lé, awje par gə́ dɔ naŋg gə́ ma m’un ndum mba kar Abrakam, gə Isaak, gə Jakob lé m’pana: M’a karee to ka̰ ŋgaka deeje lé ya#Gn 12.7, 26.3, 28.13.
Target: 1Then theLordsaid to Moses, “Leave this place, you and the people you brought up out of Egypt, and go up to the land I promised on oath to Abraham, Isaac and Jacob, saying, ‘I will give it to your descendants.’

Source: 1Mbaidɔmbaije pa togə́bè pana:
Target: 1This is what theLordsays:

Source: 1Yen ŋga Jisəb oo loo mba kɔg rəa dɔ no̰’g kəm dəwje’g lai gə́ gugu dəa sub lé el. Yeḛ ɔr ndia wəl pana: Arje dəwje lai teḛ raga.
Target: 1Then Joseph could no longer control himself before all his attendants, and he cried out, “Have everyone leave my presence!” So there was no one with Joseph when he made himself known to his brothers.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis gə Aaro̰,
Target: 1TheLordsaid to Moses and Aaron,

Source: 1Ndɔ kára bèe, Dina gə́ to ŋgolə Lea gə́ dené gə́ yeḛ ojee gə Jakob lé teḛ raga mba koo denéje gə́ mee ɓee’g neelé.
Target: 1Now Dinah, the daughter Leah had borne to Jacob, went out to visit the women of the land.

Source: 1Israɛlje d’ḭ d’aw ndá d’isi ndag-loo gə́ Moab kel tura baa gə́ Jurdɛ̰ gə́ nu gə́ wɔji dɔ Jeriko njoroŋ.
Target: 1Then the Israelites traveled to the plains of Moab and camped along the Jordan across from Jericho.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Juje pana#BI 35.6-32, TtG 4.41-43, 19.1-13:
Target: 1Then theLordsaid to Joshua:

Source: 1Dəw gə́ dené ojee lé
Target: 1“Mortals, born of woman,

Source: 1Gelee gə́ nee ɓa, ŋgakɔmje gə́ m’unda sí dan kəm’g, seḭ gə́ m’oo sí gə́ né gə́ to gə́ ŋgonkəm ləm, seḭ gə́ toje rɔlel ləm ləma, gə dɔgugu ləm ləm tɔ lé maji kar sí-seḭ gə́ m’unda sí dan kəm’g lé aarje njaŋg gin Mbaidɔmbaije’g ya.
Target: 1Therefore, my brothers and sisters, you whom I love and long for, my joy and crown, stand firm in the Lord in this way, dear friends!

Source: 1Pakɔs kḭ kaw tuga ne loo ɗao-ɗao gə́ tar.
Target: 1When theLordrestored the fortunes of#126:1OrLordbrought back the captives toZion,

Source: 1Koso njéteggintaje d’ula Elije pana: Aa oo, loo gə́ j’isije keneŋ nɔḭ’g neelé tad as sí el.
Target: 1The company of the prophets said to Elisha, “Look, the place where we meet with you is too small for us.

Source: 1See gelee ban ɓa Bao-siŋgamoŋ unda ndɔ gaŋg-rəwta kul el wa
Target: 1“Why does the Almighty not set times for judgment?

Source: 1Aa ooje, m’a kula njekaḭkula ləm ndá yeḛ ɓa a gɔl rəw nɔm’g ndá Mbaidɔmbaije gə́ seḭ sa̰geeje lé a teḛ wai kandə kəi-siée’g. Aa ooje, njekaḭkula gə́ ka̰ manrɔ gə́ seḭ ndiŋgaje lé yeḛ si ree ya. Njesigənea̰ gə́ njeboo-néje lé ɓa pa bèe#Mat 11.10, Mar 1.2, Lug 1.76, 7.27.
Target: 1“I will send my messenger, who will prepare the way before me. Then suddenly the Lord you are seeking will come to his temple; the messenger of the covenant, whom you desire, will come,” says theLordAlmighty.

Source: 1Pakɔs lə Koréje gə́ d’ar bao-pa mba karee ɔs sə dee lé
Target: 1As the deer pants for streams of water,

Source: 1Yeḛ ɓar njékwakiláje gə́ dɔg-gir-dee-joo lé gə́ rəa’g ndá yeḛ un ndia ar dee gə mba kar dee dum dɔ ndilje gə́ yèr ləm, gə dɔ rɔko̰ gə́ rara kara ləm tɔ.
Target: 1Jesus called his twelve disciples to him and gave them authority to drive out impure spirits and to heal every disease and sickness.

Source: 1Loo gə́ Sanbalat gə Tobija gə Gesem gə́ to Arabə gə njéba̰je lə sí gə́ raŋg d’oo to gə́ m’gɔl ndògo-bɔrɔ lé ləm, m’ar kəmeeje gə́ ta̰ kara godo ləm tɔ nɛ tarəwkɔgje gə́ joo ɓa m’tula el ɓəi ndá
Target: 1When word came to Sanballat, Tobiah, Geshem the Arab and the rest of our enemies that I had rebuilt the wall and not a gap was left in it—though up to that time I had not set the doors in the gates—

Source: 1Koso-dəwje gə́ Israɛl lai mbo̰ dɔ na̰ Silo ndá la kəi-kubu-kiŋga-na̰ keneŋ. Deḛ dum dɔ dəwje gə́ mee ɓee’g neelé.
Target: 1The whole assembly of the Israelites gathered at Shiloh and set up the tent of meeting there. The country was brought under their control,

Source: 1Pa lə Dabid gə́ ɔs mba kar mee Ala olé ne dəa’g
Target: 1Lord, do not rebuke me in your anger

Source: 1Goo néje’g neelé loo gə́ oŋg lə Asuerus wəi bèm mba̰ ndá yeḛ ə̰ji dɔ Basti’g, gə dɔ né gə́ yeḛ ra lé ləm, gə dɔ ndukun gə́ yeḛ un wɔji ne dəa lé ləm tɔ.
Target: 1Later when King Xerxes’ fury had subsided, he remembered Vashti and what she had done and what he had decreed about her.

Source: 1Pakɔs kḭ kaw tuga ne loo ɗao-ɗao gə́ tar.
Target: 1Blessed are all who fear theLord,

Source: 1Meeko̰ a koso dɔ deḛ gə́ d’aw Ejiptə
Target: 1Woe to those who go down to Egypt for help,

Source: 1Ma Pool, njekaḭkula lə Jeju Kristi, to gə́ mee Ala ɓa wɔji lé jeḛ gə ŋgoko̰ sí Timote
Target: 1Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God, and Timothy our brother,

Source: 1Pakɔs lə Dabid gə́ ar bao-pa mba karee ɔs sə dee lé
Target: 1In you,Lord, I have taken refuge;

Source: 1Mbaije lə Amɔrje lai gə́ d’isi par gə́ dɔ-gó lə baa gə́ Jurdɛ̰ ləm, gə mbaije lə njé gə́ Kana̰ lai gə́ d’isi ta baa-boo-kad’g ləm tɔ lé, loo gə́ d’oo to gə́ Njesigənea̰ ar baa gə́ Jurdɛ̰ kai rəa dana no̰ Israɛlje’g saar ar sí n’dəsje loo gə́ tudu kurum-kurum’g ndá meḛ dee ila kas bilim ləm, ndil dee teḛ rɔ dee’g ləm tɔ gə mbata lə Israɛlje lé ya.
Target: 1Now when all the Amorite kings west of the Jordan and all the Canaanite kings along the coast heard how theLordhad dried up the Jordan before the Israelites until they#5:1Another textual traditionwehad crossed over, their hearts melted in fear and they no longer had the courage to face the Israelites.

Source: 1Tɔɓəi ndɔ kára bèe loo gə́ kuraje lə Ala gə́ dara ree d’aar nea̰’g ndá Njekurai kara ree aar sə dee na̰’d no̰ Njesigənea̰’g tɔ.
Target: 1On another day the angels#2:1Hebrewthe sons of Godcame to present themselves before theLord, and Satan also came with them to present himself before him.

Source: 1D’a ra loo-tuu-né lé gə kag-akasia mba tuu ne né gə́ ə̰də sululu dɔ’g ndá#Tr 37.25-28,
Target: 1“Make an altar of acacia wood for burning incense.

Source: 1Maji kar sí dəjije Njesigənea̰ ma̰-ndi
Target: 1Ask theLordfor rain in the springtime;

Source: 1Dené gə́ njekəmkàr lé ra kəi ləa,
Target: 1The wise woman builds her house,

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis ta goo kwəi’g lə ŋgalə Aaro̰je gə́ joo gə́ d’wəi loo gə́ deḛ d’aw d’aar no̰ Njesigənea̰’g lé.
Target: 1TheLordspoke to Moses after the death of the two sons of Aaron who died when they approached theLord.

Source: 1Gosɔ lə li lé to yaa̰ ur dɔ ka̰ daje gə́ wala lai gə́ Njesigənea̰ Ala unda dee lé. Yeḛ dəji dené lé pana: See Ala pana: Seḭ a sɔje kandə kagje lai gə́ to mee ndɔ’g lé el, see pa togə́bè tɔgərɔ ya wa#LkJ 12.9, 20.2.
Target: 1Now the serpent was more crafty than any of the wild animals theLordGod had made. He said to the woman, “Did God really say, ‘You must not eat from any tree in the garden’?”

Source: 1Yeḛ ra loo-nékinjaməs gə́ ka̰ roo né keneŋ gə kag-akasia, ŋgalee to kəmkil dəw mi ləm, tadee as kəmkil dəw mi ləm tɔ, yee to dɔmbul ndá dəree ḭ gə́ tar as kəmkil dəw munda tɔ.
Target: 1They#38:1OrHe; also in verses 2-9built the altar of burnt offering of acacia wood, three cubits#38:1That is, about 4 1/2 feet or about 1.4 metershigh; it was square, five cubits long and five cubits wide.#38:1That is, about 7 1/2 feet or about 2.3 meters long and wide

Source: 1Jeju uru mee ɓee gə́ Jeriko unda dana gaŋg.
Target: 1Jesus entered Jericho and was passing through.

Source: 1Yen ŋga Jɔb tel ila Njesigənea̰’g pana:
Target: 1Then Job replied to theLord:

Source: 1Nékwoji lé gə́ to asəna gə téḛ bèe gə́ njekɔm’g joo lé wɔji dɔ ginkoji lə Simeo̰je, gə goo gel-bɔje lə dee lə dee. Dɔ naŋg gə́ to ka̰ dee-deḛ lé to mbuna ɓeeje’g lə Judaje.
Target: 1The second lot came out for the tribe of Simeon according to its clans. Their inheritance lay within the territory of Judah.

Source: 1Ma m’oo né gə́ majel kára dɔ naŋg nee ndá
Target: 1I have seen another evil under the sun, and it weighs heavily on mankind:

Source: 1Ta gə́ ḭ ta Njesigənea̰’d gə́ ula Jeremi lé ɓa nee:
Target: 1This is the word that came to Jeremiah from theLord:

Source: 1Ndərta gə́ wɔji dɔ dɔdilaloo gə́ mbɔr baa-boo-kad’g.
Target: 1A prophecy against the Desert by the Sea:

Source: 1Ooje ta gə́ ma m’gɔl ne ŋgatɔgje mbuna sí’g lé ma kara m’to gə́ ŋgatɔg mar dee ya ləm, némeeko̰ gə́ ra Kristi lé ma m’oo gə kəm ya ləma, ndɔ gə́ yeḛ a nduba rəa gə́ raga lé ma kara m’a si səa na̰’d ya ləm tɔ.
Target: 1To the elders among you, I appeal as a fellow elder and a witness of Christ’s sufferings who also will share in the glory to be revealed:

Source: 1Pakɔs lə Dabid gə́ ar bao-pa mba karee ɔs sə dee lé.
Target: 1Praise awaits#65:1Orbefits; the meaning of the Hebrew for this word is uncertain.you, our God, in Zion;

Source: 1Deḛ lai gə́ d’isi ɓee ɓər’g lé maji kar dee tədkag ɓée deeje mba kar dəwje d’oo ne loo kila ne ndɔl dɔ Ala el ləm, gə dɔ ta ndoo’g lə sí el ləm tɔ.
Target: 1All who are under the yoke of slavery should consider their masters worthy of full respect, so that God’s name and our teaching may not be slandered.

Source: 1Abrakam tɔg yaa̰ ar ləbee al dɔ loo sula ya. Ndá Njesigənea̰ tɔr ndia dɔ Abrakam’g gə dɔ néje lai gə́ wɔji dəa lé.
Target: 1Abraham was now very old, and theLordhad blessed him in every way.

Source: 1Pakɔs kḭ kaw tuga ne loo ɗao-ɗao gə́ tar.
Target: 1I lift up my eyes to the mountains—

Source: 1Salomo̰ unda kəi ləa-yeḛ ya tɔɓəi saar as ləb dɔg-giree-munda ɓa yeḛ tɔl kəi ləa lé bém ɓəi.
Target: 1It took Solomon thirteen years, however, to complete the construction of his palace.

Source: 1Seḭ gə́ m’unda sí dan kəm’g lé to gə́ ndukunje nee gə́ yeḛ un ar sí to togə́bè ndá ar sí n’togoje néje gə́ mina̰ gə́ gə ria-ria gə́ tia̰ darɔ sí’g gə ndil sí’g ləm, ar sí m’ɓəlje Ala mba kar meenda lə sí maji ɔr njoroŋ ləm tɔ.
Target: 1Therefore, since we have these promises, dear friends, let us purify ourselves from everything that contaminates body and spirit, perfecting holiness out of reverence for God.

Source: 1Jɔb tel ilá keneŋ pana:
Target: 1Then Job replied:

Source: 1Pa lə Dabid gə́ to kura lə Njesigənea̰ gə́ ar bao-pa mba karee ɔs sə dee lé.
Target: 1I have a message from God in my heart

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis gə Aaro̰ pana:
Target: 1TheLordsaid to Moses and Aaron:
1Give thanks to theLord, for he is good;

Source: 1Maji kari pa gə dəw gə́ tɔg ta gə́ ərm el nɛ ndəjee asəna gə bɔbije bèe ya, deḛ basaje lé ndəji dee bər-bər to gə́ ŋgakɔḭje ləm,
Target: 1Do not rebuke an older man harshly, but exhort him as if he were your father. Treat younger men as brothers,

Source: 1Sara si kəmba ləbee tɔl dəa rɔ-joo giree-siri (127), yee ɓa to ləb kisi kəmba ləa ya.
Target: 1Sarah lived to be a hundred and twenty-seven years old.

Source: 1Sopar, dəw gə́ Naaman un ta pa pana:
Target: 1Then Zophar the Naamathite replied:

Source: 1Pidije Njesigənea̰.
Target: 1Praise theLord.#111:1HebrewHallelu Yah

Source: 1Mee ndəa’g neelé Ja̰ Njera-batɛm unda loo teḛ ila mber dɔdilaloo gə́ Jude lé pana:
Target: 1In those days John the Baptist came, preaching in the wilderness of Judea

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ulam ta gə rɔtaje nee pana:
Target: 1The word of theLordcame to me:

Source: 1Pakɔs lə Dabid.
Target: 1Praise theLord, my soul;

Source: 1Pool aa kəm njégaŋ-rəwtaje lə Jibje lé njal ɔr ndá yeḛ ula dee pana: Ŋgakɔmje gə́ dəwje, saar ɓogənè m’aw no̰ Ala’g gə meekwəitar el ya ɓəi.
Target: 1Paul looked straight at the Sanhedrin and said, “My brothers, I have fulfilled my duty to God in all good conscience to this day.”

Source: 1Aa ooje, dəw lə Ala kára ḭ Juda ree Betel gə goo ndukun lə Njesigənea̰, loo gə́ Jeroboam tuga loo aw dɔ loo-nékinjaməs’g gə mba roo né gə́ ə̰də sululu keneŋ lé.
Target: 1By the word of theLorda man of God came from Judah to Bethel, as Jeroboam was standing by the altar to make an offering.

Source: 1Loo gə́ deḛ d’unda dɔ Jerusalem dəb ndá deḛ teḛ mbɔr Betpage gə Betani gə́ to mbɔr mbal gə́ ria lə Koiyoje ndá Jeju ɔr njékwakiláje joo ula dee pana:
Target: 1As they approached Jerusalem and came to Bethphage and Bethany at the Mount of Olives, Jesus sent two of his disciples,

Source: 1Isaak ɓar Jakob tɔr ndia dəa’g ndá un ndia aree togə́bè pana: I a taa dené mbuna ŋganje gə́ Kana̰’g lé el.
Target: 1So Isaac called for Jacob and blessed him. Then he commanded him: “Do not marry a Canaanite woman.

Source: 1Ndɔ mi gogo lé ŋgɔ-njekinjanéməs gə́ ria lə Ananias, deḛ gə ŋgatɔgje lə dee gə́ na̰je gə njetagərii kára ria lə Tertul lé deḛ teḛ Sesare. Deḛ səg Pool rɔ njeguburuɓee’g.
Target: 1Five days later the high priest Ananias went down to Caesarea with some of the elders and a lawyer named Tertullus, and they brought their charges against Paul before the governor.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis pana:
Target: 1TheLordsaid to Moses,

Source: 1Ləb gə́ Sargo̰, mbai gə́ Asiri ula ne Tarta̰ aree aw aḭ ne dɔ Asdod sub gə rɔ dumee ne lé,
Target: 1In the year that the supreme commander, sent by Sargon king of Assyria, came to Ashdod and attacked and captured it—

Source: 1Bḛjami oji Bela ŋgondəree ləm, Asbel to njekɔm’g joo ləm, Ahrah to njekɔm’g munda ləm,
Target: 1Benjamin was the father of Bela his firstborn,

Source: 1As ləbje bula gə́ Njesigənea̰ ar Israɛlje d’isi lɔm mbata yeḛ ɔr dee ji njéba̰je’g lə deḛ lai gə́ gugu dɔ dee sub ndá, Juje lé ləbee bula ndá, aree yeḛ ɓuga jɔ-jɔ mba̰.
Target: 1After a long time had passed and theLordhad given Israel rest from all their enemies around them, Joshua, by then a very old man,

Source: 1Mbai Dabid lé ləbee bula yaa̰ aree ɓuga jɔ-jɔ, lé d’ɔm kubuje dəa’g ya kara rəa nuŋga so el.
Target: 1When King David was very old, he could not keep warm even when they put covers over him.

Source: 1Mee ndəa gən lé bula lə njétaamee-Kristije ḭ dɔ maree’g gə́ kédé-kédé ar Helenje d’im Ǝbrəje mbata loo gə́ deḛ kai dee nésɔ gə ndɔ dee ndɔ dee ndá d’ar meḛ dee wəi dɔ njékəisiŋgaje’g lə Helenje lé.
Target: 1In those days when the number of disciples was increasing, the Hellenistic Jews#6:1That is, Jews who had adopted the Greek language and cultureamong them complained against the Hebraic Jews because their widows were being overlooked in the daily distribution of food.

Source: 1Pa lə Dabid#1Kɔr 10.26
Target: 1The earth is theLord’s, and everything in it,

Source: 1Njéteggintaje gə́ Ajee gə Jakari, ŋgolə Ido gə́ to njetegginta lé, tegginta gə ri Ala lə Israɛlje d’ar Jibje gə́ d’isi Juda gə Jerusalem tɔ.
Target: 1Now Haggai the prophet and Zechariah the prophet, a descendant of Iddo, prophesied to the Jews in Judah and Jerusalem in the name of the God of Israel, who was over them.

Source: 1Ta gə́ seḭ dəjimje mee maktub’g lə sí lé m’a tel kila sí keneŋ ŋga. M’la̰ji məəm’g m’pana: Maji kar diŋgam ɔrɔ rɔ dené el.
Target: 1Now for the matters you wrote about: “It is good for a man not to have sexual relations with a woman.”

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis gə Eləajar, ŋgolə Aaro̰ gə́ to njekinjanéməs lé pana#BI 1.1-46:
Target: 1After the plague theLordsaid to Moses and Eleazar son of Aaron, the priest,

Source: 1Yeḛ ra loo-nékinjaməs gə larkas, ŋgalee as kəmkil dəw rɔ-joo ləm, tadee as kəmkil dəw rɔ-joo ləma, dəree gə́ ḭ gə́ tar as kəmkil dəw dɔg ləm tɔ#Tr 25.1-2.
Target: 1He made a bronze altar twenty cubits long, twenty cubits wide and ten cubits high.#4:1That is, about 30 feet long and wide and 15 feet high or about 9 meters long and wide and 4.5 meters high

Source: 1Togə́bè ɓa maji kar dee d’oo sí gə́ kuraje lə Kristi ləm, gə njékaa dɔ kankəmtaje lə Ala gə́ to loo-kiya’g lé ləm tɔ.
Target: 1This, then, is how you ought to regard us: as servants of Christ and as those entrusted with the mysteries God has revealed.

Source: 1See j’a pa ban dɔ Abrakam gə́ to ka síjeḛ gə́ wɔji dɔ darɔ sí lé wa. See ɗi ɓa yeḛ iŋga wa.
Target: 1What then shall we say that Abraham, our forefather according to the flesh, discovered in this matter?

Source: 1Ala lə sí pa bèe pana:
Target: 1Comfort, comfort my people,

Source: 1Goo kwəi’g lə Sawul lé Dabid ḭ loo təd rɔ Amalekje’g ndá yeḛ si Siklag as ndɔ joo.
Target: 1After the death of Saul, David returned from striking down the Amalekites and stayed in Ziklag two days.

Source: 1Dəw kára bèe si Sejare ria lə Kɔrnəi, yeḛ to ɓée boo-njérɔje gə́ d’aḭ tɔl gə́ deḛ ɓar dee Itali.
Target: 1At Caesarea there was a man named Cornelius, a centurion in what was known as the Italian Regiment.

Source: 1Mee ndəa’g neelé Herɔdə, yeḛ gə́ to njeguburuɓee lé oo no̰ Jeju lé ndá ula kuraje ləa pana:
Target: 1At that time Herod the tetrarch heard the reports about Jesus,

Source: 1Ma Pool, kura lə Ala ləm, gə njekaḭkula lə Jeju Kristi ləm tɔ gə mba kar meekun lə dee gə́ Ala ɔr dee ra ne tɔg ləm, mba kar dee gər kankəmta gə goo rəw tədkag Ala lé ləm tɔ.
Target: 1Paul, a servant of God and an apostle of Jesus Christ to further the faith of God’s elect and their knowledge of the truth that leads to godliness—

Source: 1Tɔɓəi ma m’oo dara gə́ sigi ləm, gə naŋg gə́ sigi ləm tɔ, mbata dara gə́ dɔtar gə naŋg gə́ dɔtar lé deḛ godo ləm, baa-boo-kad kara godo ləm tɔ#Esa 65.17, 66.22, 2Pi 3.13.
Target: 1Then I saw “a new heaven and a new earth,”#21:1Isaiah 65:17for the first heaven and the first earth had passed away, and there was no longer any sea.

Source: 1Nɛ ɓasinè Njesigənea̰, yeḛ gə́ njekunda sí-seḭ njé’g lə Jakob ləm,
Target: 1But now, this is what theLordsays—

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Abram pana: Uba naŋg ḭ mee ɓee-kojii’g gə mbuna njénojije’g ləi ləm, gə mee kəi’g lə bɔbije ləm tɔ aw dɔ naŋg gə́ ma nja m’a gə tɔjii lé#NNk 7.2-3, Ǝbr 11.8.
Target: 1TheLordhad said to Abram, “Go from your country, your people and your father’s household to the land I will show you.

Source: 1Mee ndəa’g neelé njé gə́ na̰je gə́ d’aar keneŋ, d’ɔr sor né gə́ teḛ dɔ njé gə́ Galile’g lé d’ar Jeju oo, to né gə́ Pilatə ra loo gə́ yeḛ podé məs dəwje neelé gə məs néje gə́ d’inja gə́ məs lé na̰’d.
Target: 1Now there were some present at that time who told Jesus about the Galileans whose blood Pilate had mixed with their sacrifices.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ulam ta gə rɔtaje nee pana:
Target: 1The word of theLordcame to me:

Source: 1Ta gə́ oso mbi Jeremi’g wɔji dɔ Judaje lai gə́ d’isi mee ɓee gə́ Ejiptə, mee ɓee-booje gə́ Migdɔl, gə Tapanɛs, gə Nop, gə mee ɓee gə́ Patros ləm tɔ lé ɓa nee:
Target: 1This word came to Jeremiah concerning all the Jews living in Lower Egypt—in Migdol, Tahpanhes and Memphis—and in Upper Egypt:

Source: 1Gée’g gogo Jeju ɔd keneŋ aw gə́ ɓee boo-boo gə ŋgan ɓee-ɓee ila ne mber tagə́maji gə́ wɔji dɔ ɓeeko̰ lə Ala lé tegginee ar dee.
Target: 1After this, Jesus traveled about from one town and village to another, proclaiming the good news of the kingdom of God. The Twelve were with him,

Source: 1Bèe ɓa Ala ra dara ləm gə naŋg nee ləma gə boo-néje lai gə́ to keneŋ lé, tɔl dee bém ya.
Target: 1Thus the heavens and the earth were completed in all their vast array.

Source: 1Pa lə Dabid gə́ ar bao-pa mba karee ɔs sə dee lé.
Target: 1Hear me, my God, as I voice my complaint;

Source: 1Njéba̰je lə Judaje gə Bḛjamije d’oo ta lə deḛ gə́ d’ḭ ɓee ɓee-ɓər’g tel ree lé d’unda kəi gə́ to gə kəmee d’ar Njesigənea̰ Ala lə Israɛlje.
Target: 1When the enemies of Judah and Benjamin heard that the exiles were building a temple for theLord, the God of Israel,

Source: 1Jeḛ kara njékoo sə sí géeje gə́ d’aḭ dɔ sí sub lé d’isi ɗəŋ-ɗeŋ. Bèe ndá né gə́ ar rɔ sí wɔi ndiŋ-ndiŋ ləm, gə kaiya gə́ biri sí ləm tɔ lé ar sí j’ɔmje kɔrɔ ləm, ar sí j’aḭje gə meekai sam-sam gə kankəm rəw gə́ to tag no̰ sí’g ləm tɔ.
Target: 1Therefore, since we are surrounded by such a great cloud of witnesses, let us throw off everything that hinders and the sin that so easily entangles. And let us run with perseverance the race marked out for us,

Source: 1Miriam gə Aaro̰ pata gə́ yèr ndɔl ne Moyis d’wɔji ne dɔ dené gə́ Etiopi gə́ yeḛ təa, mbata to gə́ yeḛ to gonkoji gə́ Etiopi ya.
Target: 1Miriam and Aaron began to talk against Moses because of his Cushite wife, for he had married a Cushite.

Source: 1Loo gə́ kula gɔl ndògo-bɔrɔ lé godo ləm, m’tula tabidi-rəwkɔgje lé ləm tɔ ndá d’unda njéŋgəm takəije, gə njékɔspaje gə Ləbije loo-kula’g lə dee tɔ.
Target: 1After the wall had been rebuilt and I had set the doors in place, the gatekeepers, the musicians and the Levites were appointed.

Source: 1Maji kam m’ndaŋg maktub nee m’ar kura lə Ala gə́ wɔji dɔ Eglisə gə́ to Sardes pana:
Target: 1“To the angel#3:1Ormessenger; also in verses 7 and 14of the church in Sardis write:

Source: 1Ləw ləw ɓa Ala pata gə tapea ləm, gə néreaje ɓəd-ɓəd gə́ d’ɔs goo na̰ goo na̰ ar ka síje d’oo ar njéteggintaje ɓa ria ne sə dee dəa ya.
Target: 1In the past God spoke to our ancestors through the prophets at many times and in various ways,

Source: 1Dabid ḭ lée’g neelé aw looje gə́ siŋ siŋ-siŋ’d gə́ to En-Gedi ɓa si keneŋ.
Target: 1After Saul returned from pursuing the Philistines, he was told, “David is in the Desert of En Gedi.”

Source: 1Mee ndəa’g neelé nja Jeju ḭ mee kəi’g teḛ ɗaga, aw si dɔ koŋgo baa-boo’g.
Target: 1That same day Jesus went out of the house and sat by the lake.

Source: 1Sopar, dəw gə́ Naaman un ta pa pana:
Target: 1Then Zophar the Naamathite replied:

Source: 1Josapat wəi ndá deḛ dubee dɔɓar’g lə bɔbeeje-je mee ɓee-boo’g lə Dabid. Ndá ŋgonee Joram ɓa o̰ ɓee toree’g tɔ.
Target: 1Then Jehoshaphat rested with his ancestors and was buried with them in the City of David. And Jehoram his son succeeded him as king.

Source: 1Mee ndəa’g neelé ya, mbai Asuerus taa kəi lə Aman gə́ to njeba̰ lə Jibje lé ar dené ləa Este lé. Ndá Mardose ree aar no̰ mbai’g mbata Este pa to gə́ Mardose to gə́ ginkoji ləa ya.
Target: 1That same day King Xerxes gave Queen Esther the estate of Haman, the enemy of the Jews. And Mordecai came into the presence of the king, for Esther had told how he was related to her.

Source: 1Mbaije lə gel-bɔje lə Galaad, gə́ to ŋgolə Makir, gə́ to ŋgolə Manasə, gə́ to gə́ mbuna gel-bɔje’g lə ŋgalə Jisəb lé ree rɔ Moyis’g gə no̰ mbaije gə́ to mbai dɔ gel-bɔje lə ŋgan Israɛlje lé
Target: 1The family heads of the clan of Gilead son of Makir, the son of Manasseh, who were from the clans of the descendants of Joseph, came and spoke before Moses and the leaders, the heads of the Israelite families.

Source: 1Elije ula dené gə́ yeḛ ar ŋgonee tel si kəmba lé pana: Uba naŋg ḭta, i gə njémeekəije ləi awje aw síje loo gə́ kəm kisi keneŋ, mbata Njesigənea̰ a gə kar ɓoo-boo oso ndá ɓoo-boo neelé a koso dɔ ɓee’g as ləb siri#2Mb 4.8-37.
Target: 1Now Elisha had said to the woman whose son he had restored to life, “Go away with your family and stay for a while wherever you can, because theLordhas decreed a famine in the land that will last seven years.”

Source: 1I lé maji kari ula dee ta néje gə́ d’aw na̰’d gə ta ndoo gə́ gəd lé.
Target: 1You, however, must teach what is appropriate to sound doctrine.

Source: 1Gə kuree waga lam gə́ to naḭ kinja kó lé ndá Samso̰ aw gə ŋgon bya̰ mba koo ne dené ləa. Yeḛ pana: M’a m’ndigi kaw rɔ dené’g ləm mee kəi’g ləa. Nɛ bɔ denéje ləa lé ɔgee loo kandə kəi.
Target: 1Later on, at the time of wheat harvest, Samson took a young goat and went to visit his wife. He said, “I’m going to my wife’s room.” But her father would not let him go in.

Source: 1Ndɔ kára bèe Jeju ra tamaji dəb loo gə́ kára. Loo gə́ yeḛ əw rəa ndá njekwakilá gə́ kára mbuna mareeje’g ulá pana: Mbaidɔmbaije, maji kari ndoo sí loo ra tamaji lé to gə́ Ja̰ ndoo ne njékea̰je bèe tɔ.
Target: 1One day Jesus was praying in a certain place. When he finished, one of his disciples said to him, “Lord, teach us to pray, just as John taught his disciples.”

Source: 1Koso-dəwje lai mbo̰ dɔ na̰ to gə́ dəw gə́ kára ba bèe ndaa-loo gə́ to tarəwɓee gə́ ria lə Rəw-Manje. Deḛ d’ula Esdras, njendaji-maktub lé mba karee ree gə maktub godndu Moyis gə́ Njesigənea̰ aree mbata lə Israɛlje lé.
Target: 1all the people came together as one in the square before the Water Gate. They told Ezra the teacher of the Law to bring out the Book of the Law of Moses, which theLordhad commanded for Israel.

Source: 1Ma lé m’to dəw gə́ m’oo ko̰-né
Target: 1I am the man who has seen affliction

Source: 1Nadab gə Abihu, deḛ gə́ to ŋgalə Aaro̰ lé nana kara un bai-su-né ləa-ləa ɓa d’ɔm pər keneŋ tɔɓəi d’ɔm né gə́ ə̰də sululu dɔ’g tɔ, ndá d’aw d’aar ne no̰ Njesigənea̰’g gə pər gə́ gə goo rəbee el, mbata yeḛ un ndia dɔ’g ar dee el.
Target: 1Aaron’s sons Nadab and Abihu took their censers, put fire in them and added incense; and they offered unauthorized fire before theLord, contrary to his command.

Source: 1Aa ooje, taje gə́ Jeremi, njetegginta gə́ si Jerusalem lé ndaŋg ula ne ar ges njé gə́ tɔgje gə́ d’wa dee ɓər ləm, gə njékinjanéməsje ləm, gə njéteggintaje ləma, gə koso-dəwje lai gə́ Nebukadnesar wa dee ɓər Jerusalem aw sə dee Babilɔn ləm tɔ#2Mb 24.12-16, 2SgI 36.10,
Target: 1This is the text of the letter that the prophet Jeremiah sent from Jerusalem to the surviving elders among the exiles and to the priests, the prophets and all the other people Nebuchadnezzar had carried into exile from Jerusalem to Babylon.

Source: 1Samso̰ aw ɓee gə́ Gaja, yeḛ oo kaiya dené kára ndá yeḛ aw rəa’g.
Target: 1One day Samson went to Gaza, where he saw a prostitute. He went in to spend the night with her.

Source: 1Samel un ta pa ar Israɛlje lai.
Target: 1And Samuel’s word came to all Israel.

Source: 1Ləb ko̰ɓee lə Nebukadnesar gə́ njekɔm’g joo lé yeḛ ni nije. Mée tila ŋgaḭla-ŋgaḭla ar ɓi gə́ tḛ́-tḛ́ bèe ya kara oso kəmee’g el.
Target: 1In the second year of his reign, Nebuchadnezzar had dreams; his mind was troubled and he could not sleep.

Source: 1Ndərta gə́ wɔji dɔ wəl-loo koo némḭdije.
Target: 1A prophecy against the Valley of Vision:

Source: 1Wai! Lée m’iŋga ŋgon Kəi-to-mbàje dɔdilaloo’g ndá
Target: 1Oh, that my head were a spring of water

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis pana: Oo, ma m’ari to asəna gə Ala mbata lə Parao̰, ŋgokɔḭ Aaro̰ lé to njekun ta gə́ tai’g kula dəwje tɔ.
Target: 1Then theLordsaid to Moses, “See, I have made you like God to Pharaoh, and your brother Aaron will be your prophet.

Source: 1Loo gə́ Samel ɓuga mba̰ ndá yeḛ unda ŋganeeje ɓa gə́ njégaŋ-rəwtaje dɔ Israɛlje’g.
Target: 1When Samuel grew old, he appointed his sons as Israel’s leaders.#8:1Traditionallyjudges

Source: 1Ləb gə́ njekɔm’g dɔg gə́ Sedesias, mbai gə́ Juda o̰ ne ɓee lé Njesigənea̰ ula Jeremi ta. Ləbee neelé to ləb ko̰ɓee lə Nebukadnesar gə́ njekɔm’g dɔg-giree-jinaijoo tɔ#2Mb 21.1-7.
Target: 1This is the word that came to Jeremiah from theLordin the tenth year of Zedekiah king of Judah, which was the eighteenth year of Nebuchadnezzar.

Source: 1Kəm ɓa m’a man ne rɔm dɔ’g
Target: 1“I made a covenant with my eyes

Source: 1Yen, meḛ sí dɔ rɔ sí’g nà a kundaje néra meekarabasur lə sí kəm dəwje’g. Ɓó lé seḭ undaje néra meekarabasur lə sí kəm dəwje’g togə́bè ndá a kiŋgaje née ji Bɔ síje gə́ si dara lé nda̰ el#Mat 23.5.
Target: 1“Be careful not to practice your righteousness in front of others to be seen by them. If you do, you will have no reward from your Father in heaven.

Source: 1Mee ləb kwəi’g lə mbai Ojias lé, ma m’oo Mbaidɔmbaije gə́ si dɔ kalimbai gə́ to tar sab, ar ta kubu ləa gə́ ŋgal yududu taa loo mee kəi-Ala’g pəl-pəl#2Mb 15.7, 2SgI 26.23.
Target: 1In the year that King Uzziah died, I saw the Lord, high and exalted, seated on a throne; and the train of his robe filled the temple.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ulam ta gə rɔtaje nee pana:
Target: 1The word of theLordcame to me:

Source: 1Samso̰ aw Timna ndá yeḛ oo ŋgoma̰də kára mbuna ŋgama̰dje’g mee ɓee’g lə Pilistije.
Target: 1Samson went down to Timnah and saw there a young Philistine woman.

Source: 1Ndilmeenda taa mee Jeju pəl-pəl loo gə́ yeḛ ḭ ta baa gə́ Jurdɛ̰ tel ree lé ndá Ndil lé ɔsee aw səa dɔdilaloo’g
Target: 1Jesus, full of the Holy Spirit, left the Jordan and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness,

Source: 1Juje lé ləbee bula yaa̰ aree ɓuga jogee-jogee ŋga. Togə́bè Njesigənea̰ ulá pana: I lé ləbi bula yaa̰ ari ɓuga mba̰ tɔɓəi ges ɓeeje gə́ kəm kari taa lé kara nai yaa̰ ɓəi tɔ.
Target: 1When Joshua had grown old, theLordsaid to him, “You are now very old, and there are still very large areas of land to be taken over.

Source: 1Pilistije d’ɔr rɔ d’aw rɔ gə Israɛlje ndá Israɛlje d’aḭ no̰ Pilistije’g ndá njé gə́ na̰je bula toso d’wəi dɔ mbal’d gə́ Gilboa.
Target: 1Now the Philistines fought against Israel; the Israelites fled before them, and many fell dead on Mount Gilboa.

Source: 1Larnda lé bwa gə́ ka̰ kɔr keneŋ to gən ləm,
Target: 1There is a mine for silver

Source: 1Pa lə Dabid
Target: 1Keep me safe, my God,

Source: 1Tɔɓəi yeḛ ra né gə ndia gə́ boi wəl mbim’g pana: Seḭ gə́ a gə tujije ɓee-boo lé reeje pər gə́ nee, nana kara gə nétujiloo ləa jia’g-jia’g ya.
Target: 1Then I heard him call out in a loud voice, “Bring near those who are appointed to execute judgment on the city, each with a weapon in his hand.”

Source: 1Loo gə́ Ala lə sí gə́ Njesigənea̰ a tuji ginkoji dəwje gə raŋg kya̰ ɓee lə dee kar sí ləm, loo gə́ seḭ a tuba deeje gə mba kisije mee ɓee-booje’g lə dee gə mee kəije’g lə dee ləm tɔ ndá,
Target: 1When theLordyour God has destroyed the nations whose land he is giving you, and when you have driven them out and settled in their towns and houses,

Source: 1Aa ooje, gosota-kəmkàrje lə Salomo̰ gə́ dəwje lə Ejekias, mbai gə́ Juda lé tɔs dee na̰’d raŋg ya tɔɓəi.
Target: 1These are more proverbs of Solomon, compiled by the men of Hezekiah king of Judah:

Source: 1Pilistije d’un sa̰duk-manrɔ lə Ala d’ḭ ne Eben-Ejer d’aw ne Asdod.
Target: 1After the Philistines had captured the ark of God, they took it from Ebenezer to Ashdod.

Source: 1Loo gə́ jeḛ n’teḛ ta yoo’g mba̰ ndá kəm sí inja dɔ dɔgoré-loo’g neelé ar sí n’gər to gə́ ria lə Maltə.
Target: 1Once safely on shore, we found out that the island was called Malta.

Source: 1Yeḛ gə́ ra tɔg dɔ meekun’g ləa el ndá waje gə́ rɔ sí’g ɓó maḭje na̰ ta dəa’g tareeje ne el#Kol 2.16.
Target: 1Accept the one whose faith is weak, without quarreling over disputable matters.

Source: 1Seḭ gə́ m’unda sí dan kəm’g lé ɔmje meḛ sí dɔ ndilje’g lai el, nɛ aḭje meḛ ndilje gə mba koo see d’ḭ rɔ Ala’g ya wa. Mbata njéteggintaje gə́ ŋgɔm bula d’unda loo teḛ mbuna dəwje’g dɔ naŋg nee.
Target: 1Dear friends, do not believe every spirit, but test the spirits to see whether they are from God, because many false prophets have gone out into the world.

Source: 1Gelee gə́ nee ɓa ar sí j’ya̰ néndoo gə́ dɔtar gə́ wɔji dɔ ta lə Kristi ɓa j’aw ne gə́ kédé-kédé dɔ néndoo gə́ ɔr ne dɔ njoroŋ ɓəi ɓó ar sí n’tum gin ta néje neelé gogo el: yee ɓa to ta gə́ wɔji dɔ kya̰ goo néra sí gə́ ləw gə́ unda naŋg ndəs ləm,
Target: 1Therefore let us move beyond the elementary teachings about Christ and be taken forward to maturity, not laying again the foundation of repentance from acts that lead to death,#6:1Orfrom useless ritualsand of faith in God,

Source: 1Tɔgərɔ, tɔgərɔ, ma m’ula sí təsərə, yeḛ gə́ rara ɓa gə́ taa rəw gə́ gəd mba kandə ne loo-kaar-badje’g el nɛ yeḛ saŋg rəw gə́ raŋg gə mba kal kaw keneŋ ndá yeḛ nja ɓa to gə́ njeɓogo ləm, to gə́ gayim-ɓogo ləm tɔ,
Target: 1“Very truly I tell you Pharisees, anyone who does not enter the sheep pen by the gate, but climbs in by some other way, is a thief and a robber.

Source: 1Mee ləb gə́ njekɔm’g misa̰ lé naḭ gə́ njekɔm’g misa̰ ra ndɔ mi loo gə́ ma m’isi mee kəi’g ləm ləm, ŋgatɔgje gə́ Juda d’isi nɔm’g ləm tɔ ndá Mbaidɔmbaije gə́ Njesigənea̰ ila jia dɔm’g.
Target: 1In the sixth year, in the sixth month on the fifth day, while I was sitting in my house and the elders of Judah were sitting before me, the hand of the SovereignLordcame on me there.

Source: 1Ri dəw gə́ ɓar gə́ majee lé
Target: 1A good name is better than fine perfume,

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis pana: M’a kar tuji-boo gə́ raŋg kára teḛ dɔ Parao̰’g gə dɔ Ejiptə’g ya ɓəi tɔ. Gée gə́ gogo ndá yeḛ a kya̰ sí kar sí ḭje awje ŋga. Loo gə́ yeḛ a gə kya̰ sí kar sí awje tɔgərɔ ya ndá yeḛ a tuba sí loo gə́ nee’g gə́ tuba ya#Ləb 23.5, BI 9.1-5, 28.16, TtG 16.1-2.
Target: 1Now theLordhad said to Moses, “I will bring one more plague on Pharaoh and on Egypt. After that, he will let you go from here, and when he does, he will drive you out completely.

Source: 1Jɔb un gosota ləa ɓəi pana:
Target: 1Job continued his discourse:

Source: 1Diŋgam kára gə́ to gə́ ginkoji’g lə Ləbi taa dené gə́ to gə́ ginkoji’g neelé ya.
Target: 1Now a man of the tribe of Levi married a Levite woman,

Source: 1Ndərta gə́ pa wɔji dɔ ɓee gə́ Tir.
Target: 1A prophecy against Tyre:

Source: 1Seḭ njémeekarabasurje lé
Target: 1Sing joyfully to theLord, you righteous;

Source: 1Yeḛ ɔr nɔm teḛ səm par gə́ gadloo gə́ raga gə́ to gə́ kel dɔgel ndá yeḛ teḛ səm mee ŋgan kəije gə́ to wɔji dɔ pən-loo gə́ to kari ba njoroŋ’d ləm, wɔji dɔ kəi gə́ to kel dɔgel njoroŋ ləm tɔ.
Target: 1Then the man led me northward into the outer court and brought me to the rooms opposite the temple courtyard and opposite the outer wall on the north side.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ pata togə́bè ar Sirus gə́ yeḛ wa dəa gə ubu lé
Target: 1“This is what theLordsays to his anointed,

Source: 1Ma m’unda Njesigənea̰ dan kəm’g
Target: 1I love theLord, for he heard my voice;

Source: 1Loo gə́ ləb Abram aḭ rɔ-jinaikara-giree-jinaikara (99) ndá Njesigənea̰ teḛ kəm Abram’g ulá pana: Ma m’to Ala gə́ Bao-siŋgamoŋ. Maji kari njaa gə gelgodo ləi nɔm’g.
Target: 1When Abram was ninety-nine years old, theLordappeared to him and said, “I am God Almighty#17:1HebrewEl-Shaddai; walk before me faithfully and be blameless.

Source: 1Gée’g gogo ndá m’a kɔm Ndiləm dɔ dəwje’g lai gə loo-loo,
Target: 1“In those days and at that time,

Source: 1Gée gə́ gogo mee ləb ko̰ɓee’g lə Artajerjɛs, mbai gə́ Persə lé ndá Esdras ree Jerusalem, yeḛ lé to ŋgolə Seraja gə́ to ŋgolə Ajaria, gə́ to ŋgolə Hilkija,
Target: 1After these things, during the reign of Artaxerxes king of Persia, Ezra son of Seraiah, the son of Azariah, the son of Hilkiah,

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ulam ta gə rɔtaje nee pana: Ɔd aw ndogo ndar gə́ d’ṵji gə kúla palégal tɔ ɓəri’g nɛ a kula dan mán’g el.
Target: 1This is what theLordsaid to me: “Go and buy a linen belt and put it around your waist, but do not let it touch water.”

Source: 1Ndɔ gə́ Moyis tɔl ta kula la kəi-kubu lé bém ndá yeḛ saga ubu dɔ’g undá ne gə kəmee gə nékulaje ləa lai ləm, loo-nékinjaməs lé kara gə nékulaje ləa lai ləm tɔ, yeḛ saga ubu dɔ dee’g unda dee ne gə kəmee tɔ.
Target: 1When Moses finished setting up the tabernacle, he anointed and consecrated it and all its furnishings. He also anointed and consecrated the altar and all its utensils.

Source: 1Balaam ula Balak pana: Maji kari ra loo-nékinjanéməsje as siri loo gə́ nee’g am, tɔɓəi wa dɔ gɔl bɔ maŋgje siri gə bàl badje siri loo gə́ nee’g am tɔ.
Target: 1Balaam said, “Build me seven altars here, and prepare seven bulls and seven rams for me.”

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis pana: Aw rɔ Parao̰’g ndá i a kula pana: Njesigənea̰, Ala lə Ǝbrəje lé pa bèe pana: Ya̰ dəwje lə neḛ ar dee d’aw mba kar dee d’aw pole neḛ.
Target: 1Then theLordsaid to Moses, “Go to Pharaoh and say to him, ‘This is what theLord, the God of the Hebrews, says: “Let my people go, so that they may worship me.”

Source: 1Loo gə́ dəwje d’un kudu kɔs goo na̰ gə́ kédé-kédé dɔ naŋg nee ləm, d’oji ne ŋganje gə́ dené ləm tɔ ndá#Jɔb 1.6, 2.1
Target: 1When human beings began to increase in number on the earth and daughters were born to them,

Source: 1Tornduje lai gə́ ma m’un m’ar sí ɓogənè lé seḭ a kaaje dɔ dee kər-kər gə mba raje née, yee ɓa seḭ a síje ne kəmba ləm, bula lə sí a kḭ ne dɔ maree’d gə́ kédé-kédé ləma, seḭ a ka̰dje ne mee ɓee gə́ Njesigənea̰ un ndia dɔ’g gə ndu man mba kar bɔ síje-je lé ləm tɔ.
Target: 1Be careful to follow every command I am giving you today, so that you may live and increase and may enter and possess the land theLordpromised on oath to your ancestors.

Source: 1Jepte gə́ to dəw gə́ Galaad lé to bao-rɔ. Yeḛ lé to ŋgolə kaiya-dené gə́ yeḛ ojee gə Galaad ya.
Target: 1Jephthah the Gileadite was a mighty warrior. His father was Gilead; his mother was a prostitute.

Source: 1Kédé gə́ dɔtar TA si keneŋ. TA neelé si gə Ala ləm, TA neelé to Ala ləm tɔ.
Target: 1In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

Source: 1Pakɔs gə́ ar bao-pa mba karee ɔs sə dee lé. D’ɔs gə nékimje gə́ gə kuláje.
Target: 1May God be gracious to us and bless us

Source: 1Israɛlje d’isi Sitim, koso-dəwje d’un kudu tusu rɔ dee kya̰ ji mɔdkaiya’g gə denéje gə́ Moab.
Target: 1While Israel was staying in Shittim, the men began to indulge in sexual immorality with Moabite women,

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis pana:
Target: 1Then theLordsaid to Moses:

Source: 1Dəwje gə́ na̰je d’ḭ Jude ree ndoo ŋgako̰ deeje d’ula dee pana: Ɓó lé seḭ injaje tamɔd sí gə goo godndu Moyis el ndá seḭ asjekəm kiŋga kaji el#Ləb 12.3.
Target: 1Certain people came down from Judea to Antioch and were teaching the believers: “Unless you are circumcised, according to the custom taught by Moses, you cannot be saved.”

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis pana:
Target: 1TheLordsaid to Moses,

Source: 1See i gər kàr gə́ bya̰je gə́ wala d’oji ne ŋgan deeje wa.
Target: 1“Do you know when the mountain goats give birth?

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Jeremi ta mee ndəa’g lə Jojakim, ŋgolə Jojias gə́ to mbai gə́ Juda gə rɔtaje nee pana#2Mb 23.36–24.6, 2SgI 36.5-7:
Target: 1This is the word that came to Jeremiah from theLordduring the reign of Jehoiakim son of Josiah king of Judah:

Source: 1Gée gə́ gogo to ndɔ ra naḭ lə Jibje ndá Jeju ḭ keneŋ aw Jerusalem.
Target: 1Some time later, Jesus went up to Jerusalem for one of the Jewish festivals.

Source: 1Aa ooje, godnduje gə ndukunje gə́ seḭ a kaaje dɔ dee kər-kər gə mba ra née, mba kar sí síje ne kəmba mee ɓee gə́ Njesigənea̰ Ala lə bɔ síje-je ar sí gə́ né ka̰ sí-seḭ lé ɓa nee:
Target: 1These are the decrees and laws you must be careful to follow in the land that theLord, the God of your ancestors, has given you to possess—as long as you live in the land.

Source: 1Loo gə́ d’wɔji-kwɔji gə mba kar sí j’uru mee bato’g gə mba kaw Itali ndá d’ila Pool gə daŋgai mareeje gə́ na̰je ji Julius’g gə́ to njekɔrno̰ njérɔje gə́ tɔl gə́ ɓar dee ka̰ Augustə.
Target: 1When it was decided that we would sail for Italy, Paul and some other prisoners were handed over to a centurion named Julius, who belonged to the Imperial Regiment.

Source: 1Israɛlje ra né gə́ taa kəm Njesigənea̰ el ndá Njesigənea̰ uba dee ya̰ dee ji Madianje’g as ləb siri.
Target: 1The Israelites did evil in the eyes of theLord, and for seven years he gave them into the hands of the Midianites.

Source: 1Jeju uru mee to’g ndá yeḛ gaŋg mán teḛ mee ɓee-boo’g ləa.
Target: 1Jesus stepped into a boat, crossed over and came to his own town.

Source: 1Ndɔ gə́ dɔtar gə́ njekorè goo ndɔ-kwa-rɔ lé loo to gḭdo-gḭdo ɓəi ndá Mari gə́ Magdala gə Mari gə́ raŋg lé d’aw mba tən dɔɓar koo.
Target: 1After the Sabbath, at dawn on the first day of the week, Mary Magdalene and the other Mary went to look at the tomb.

Source: 1Rɔ aw gə́ kédé-kédé mbuna njé’g lə Sawul gə njé’g lə Dabid. Siŋga Dabid ḭ dɔ maree’d gə́ kédé-kédé nɛ ka̰ njé’g lə Sawul ɓa rəm gə́ gogo-gogo tɔ.
Target: 1The war between the house of Saul and the house of David lasted a long time. David grew stronger and stronger, while the house of Saul grew weaker and weaker.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis gə Aaro̰ pana:
Target: 1TheLordsaid to Moses and Aaron:

Source: 1Né gə́ to keneŋ gən kédé gə́ dɔtar saar lé né gə́ jeḛ j’oo taree gə mbi sí ləm, né gə́ jeḛ j’oo gə kəm sí ləm, né gə́ kəm sí wəi dɔ’g sḭ ləma, né gə́ j’wa gə ji sí peb ləm tɔ gə́ wɔji dɔ Ta kəmə lé#Ja̰ 1.1
Target: 1That which was from the beginning, which we have heard, which we have seen with our eyes, which we have looked at and our hands have touched—this we proclaim concerning the Word of life.

Source: 1Kaw gə́ m’isi m’aw gə́ rɔ sí’g ɓasinè lé to gɔl munda ləa ŋga. Ta gə́ rara gə́ to keneŋ ɓa njékoogootareje jooje əsé munda jén d’ɔr taree təsərə ndá taree a kwa dɔ njea ɓəi ya#TtG 17.6, 19.15.
Target: 1This will be my third visit to you. “Every matter must be established by the testimony of two or three witnesses.”#13:1Deut. 19:15

Source: 1Mee naḭ gə́ njekɔm’g jinaijoo’g, mee ləb ko̰ɓee’g lə Darius gə́ njekɔm’g joo lé Njesigənea̰ ula Jakari ŋgolə Berekia, ŋgoka Ido, njetegginta lé ta gə rɔtaje neelé pana#Esd 4.24–5.1, 6.14:
Target: 1In the eighth month of the second year of Darius, the word of theLordcame to the prophet Zechariah son of Berekiah, the son of Iddo:

Source: 1Gée gə́ gogo kuraje lə mbai gə́ Ejiptə joo ra né gə́ taa kəm ɓée deeje el. Yeḛ gə́ kára to njekaa dɔ njékaree nékaije ləm, maree to njekaa dɔ njéra muru kaareeje ləm tɔ.
Target: 1Some time later, the cupbearer and the baker of the king of Egypt offended their master, the king of Egypt.

Source: 1Jetro gə́ njekinjanéməs gə́ Madian gə́ to məəm Moyisje lé oo ta néje lai gə́ Ala ra mbata lə Moyis ləm, gə mbata lə Israɛlje gə́ to dəwje ləa ləma, yeḛ oo to gə́ Njesigənea̰ ar Israɛlje d’unda loo mee ɓee gə́ Ejiptə teḛ ləm tɔ.
Target: 1Now Jethro, the priest of Midian and father-in-law of Moses, heard of everything God had done for Moses and for his people Israel, and how theLordhad brought Israel out of Egypt.

Source: 1Abrakam taa dené gə́ raŋg ya ɓəi, ria lə Ketura.
Target: 1Abraham had taken another wife, whose name was Keturah.

Source: 1Ndil lé unm aw səm tarəwkəi’g lə Njesigənea̰ gə́ to bər gə́ tel təa par gə́ bər. Ndá aa oo, dəwje rɔ-joo-gir-dee-mi d’isi tarəw gə́ loo-kandə-kəi’g, tɔɓəi ma m’oo Jaasania, ŋgolə Ajur gə Pelatia, ŋgolə Benaja deḛ gə́ to mbaije lə koso-dəwje lé mbuna dee’g lé.
Target: 1Then the Spirit lifted me up and brought me to the gate of the house of theLordthat faces east. There at the entrance of the gate were twenty-five men, and I saw among them Jaazaniah son of Azzur and Pelatiah son of Benaiah, leaders of the people.

Source: 1Israɛlje manrɔ dee bər-bər Mispa’g pana: Dəw kára kara mbuna sí’g a kun ŋgonee gə́ dené kar dəw gə́ to Bḛjami təa gə́ dené el.
Target: 1The men of Israel had taken an oath at Mizpah: “Not one of us will give his daughter in marriage to a Benjamite.”

Source: 1Ndɔ kára bèe loo gə́ Jeju si ndoo koso-dəwje ta mee kəi-Ala’g ləm, yeḛ ɔr goo tagə́maji ar dee ləm tɔ ndá mbai dɔ njékinjanéməsje-je ləm, gə njéndaji-maktubje ləma, gə ŋgatɔgje ləm tɔ lé rəm pər gə́ rəa’g
Target: 1One day as Jesus was teaching the people in the temple courts and proclaiming the good news, the chief priests and the teachers of the law, together with the elders, came up to him.

Source: 1Njékinjanéməsje ləm, gə Ləbije ləma, gə ginkoji lə Ləbi doŋgɔ ləm tɔ lé d’a kiŋga né ka̰ dee əsé nédɔji lə dee na̰’d gə Israɛlje el, d’a kul rɔ dee gə nékinjanéməsje gə́ ka̰ roo kwa ne Njesigənea̰ meḛ dee’g ləm, gə nédɔji gə́ to ka̰ Njesigənea̰ lé ləm tɔ ɓa.
Target: 1The Levitical priests—indeed, the whole tribe of Levi—are to have no allotment or inheritance with Israel. They shall live on the food offerings presented to theLord, for that is their inheritance.

Source: 1Seḭ gə́ síje dɔgoré-looje’g lé
Target: 1“Be silent before me, you islands!

Source: 1Ndɔ gə́ doŋgɔr gə́ njekorè goo ndɔ-kwa-rɔ lé denéje d’odo kuma̰ gə́ ə̰də sululu gə́ deḛ podé na̰’d lé teḛ ne gə ndɔ rad d’aw ne dɔɓar’g.
Target: 1On the first day of the week, very early in the morning, the women took the spices they had prepared and went to the tomb.

Source: 1Kəi-kubu-si-Ala d’a ra gə pal-kubuje dɔg gə́ d’ṵji gə kúla palégal gə́ sorè ləm, gə kubu gə́ ndiri ndul piro-piro gə kas gəḭ gə kas njir-njir ləm tɔ, d’a ndaji Nékundaje gə́ dara gə́ tɔs dee gə ŋgaŋgee béréré-béréré keneŋ tɔ.
Target: 1“Make the tabernacle with ten curtains of finely twisted linen and blue, purple and scarlet yarn, with cherubim woven into them by a skilled worker.

Source: 1Dəw kára ria lə Jɔb si mee ɓee gə́ Uts. Dəw neelé to njera né gə goo rəbee ləm, gə njenéra gə́ danasur ləm tɔ. Yeḛ ɓəl Ala ləm, yeḛ unda ria ɓad dɔ néra gə́ majel’g ləm tɔ.
Target: 1In the land of Uz there lived a man whose name was Job. This man was blameless and upright; he feared God and shunned evil.

Source: 1Loo gə́ kàr ɔs yaa̰ ndá Njesigənea̰ teḛ kəm Abrakam’g loo gə́ yeḛ si ta kəi-kubu’g ləa mbuna kag-sɛnəje gə́ Mamré.
Target: 1TheLordappeared to Abraham near the great trees of Mamre while he was sitting at the entrance to his tent in the heat of the day.

Source: 1Aa ooje, ri deḛ gə́ to mbai dɔ gel-bɔje gə ri ginka deeje-je gə́ d’ḭ səm Babilɔn mee ləb ko̰ɓee’g lə mbai Artajerjɛs lé ɓa nee:
Target: 1These are the family heads and those registered with them who came up with me from Babylon during the reign of King Artaxerxes:

Source: 1Jeju lé d’ojee mee ɓee gə́ Betlehem loo gə́ mbai Herɔdə to ne njeko̰ɓee gə́ Jude lé. Aa ooje bao-gosɔnégərje d’ḭ bər ree Jerusalem.
Target: 1After Jesus was born in Bethlehem in Judea, during the time of King Herod, Magi#2:1Traditionallywise menfrom the east came to Jerusalem

Source: 1Teḛ gə ndɔ rad, mbai dɔ njékinjanéməsje-je d’wa dɔ na̰ gə njé gə́ tɔgje ləm, gə njéndaji-maktubje ləma, gə njégaŋ-rəwtaje lə Jibje ləm tɔ mba kwɔji loo né gə́ d’a gə ra. Yen ŋga deḛ d’uba Jeju gə kúla njim-njim ndɔree d’aw d’ulá ji Pilatə’g.
Target: 1Very early in the morning, the chief priests, with the elders, the teachers of the law and the whole Sanhedrin, made their plans. So they bound Jesus, led him away and handed him over to Pilate.

Source: 1Ma m’ula rɔm m’pana: Maji ya! M’a kaḭ məəi gə rɔlel ndá i a si dan rɔlel’g. Nɛ aa oo, yee gə́ nee kara to né gə́ kari ba ya ɓəi.
Target: 1I said to myself, “Come now, I will test you with pleasure to find out what is good.” But that also proved to be meaningless.

Source: 1Gə goo bula lə Israɛlje lé, deḛ gə́ to mbai dɔ gel-bɔje lə dee ləm, deḛ gə́ to ɓé-njérɔje gə́ tɔl-dɔg-dɔg (1.000) ləm, gə tɔl-tɔl (100) ləm, gə deḛ gə́ to ɓé-njérɔje gə́ wɔji dɔ kudu njérɔje gə́ ra kula lə mbai ləma, gə deḛ gə́ d’ḭ raga ree ɓée gə deḛ gə́ d’ḭ ɓée teḛ raga ləm tɔ, gə naḭ-naḭ, mee naḭje lai gə́ mee ləb kára’g lé ndá deḛ gə́ kai dee kudu kára d’as dəwje tɔl-dɔg-loo rɔ-joo-gir-dee-sɔ sɔ (24.000).
Target: 1This is the list of the Israelites—heads of families, commanders of thousands and commanders of hundreds, and their officers, who served the king in all that concerned the army divisions that were on duty month by month throughout the year. Each division consisted of 24,000 men.

Source: 1To kəm kam m’ti rɔm yaa̰ ya. Yee ɓa to né gə́ to sur el. Nɛ lé bèe kara m’a teḛ ne dɔ némḭdije gə néje gə́ to loo-kiya’g gə́ Mbaidɔmbaije riba dɔ dee am m’oo lé.
Target: 1I must go on boasting. Although there is nothing to be gained, I will go on to visions and revelations from the Lord.

Source: 1Loo gə́ deḛ ree gə sa̰duk-manrɔ lə Ala mba̰ ndá d’unda dan mee kəi-kubu gə́ Dabid la wɔji ne dəa tɔɓəi deḛ d’inja nékinjanéməsje gə́ ka̰ roo ləm, gə nékinjanéməsje gə́ ka̰ kɔm na̰’d ləm tɔ no̰ Njesigənea̰’g.
Target: 1They brought the ark of God and set it inside the tent that David had pitched for it, and they presented burnt offerings and fellowship offerings before God.

Source: 1Pa lə Koréje gə́ d’ar bao-pa karee ɔs sə dee lé
Target: 1Clap your hands, all you nations;

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ulam ta gə rɔtaje nee pana:
Target: 1The word of theLordcame to me:

Source: 1Ma m’aa loo gərərə ndá aa oo, pən-loo gə́ tar gə́ to dɔ Nékundaje gə́ dara’g lé né gə́ to asəna gə mbal gə́ ɓaree sapir bèe to keneŋ. Tɔɓəi né gə́ to asəna gə kalimbai bèe to dɔ dee’g tar#Ejk 1.26, LkJ 4.2.
Target: 1I looked, and I saw the likeness of a throne of lapis lazuli above the vault that was over the heads of the cherubim.

Source: 1Mee ndɔ gə́ njekɔm’g munda’g lé loo gə́ Dabid gə njérɔje ləa ree Siklag ndá Amalekje ree wai par gə́ dɔkɔl lə ɓee neelé ləm, gə d’ila rɔ dɔ Siklag’d ləm tɔ ndá, deḛ tuji ɓee gə́ Siklag pugudu-pugudu ləm, rée pər ləm tɔ.
Target: 1David and his men reached Ziklag on the third day. Now the Amalekites had raided the Negev and Ziklag. They had attacked Ziklag and burned it,

Source: 1Gosota-kəmkàrje lə Salomo̰, ŋgolə Dabid, mbai gə́ Israɛl#1Mb 5.12.
Target: 1The proverbs of Solomon son of David, king of Israel:

Source: 1Mee ləb gə́ njekɔm’g joo gə́ Darius to ne mbai, mee ndɔ gə́ dɔtar’g lə naḭ gə́ njekɔm’g misa̰ lé ɓa Njesigənea̰ ula Aje, njetegginta ta nee aree un aw ula Jorobabel, ŋgolə Səaltiel, gə́ to njeguburuɓee gə́ Juda ləm, gə Juje, ŋgolə Josadak, ŋgɔ-njekinjanéməs ləm tɔ pana#Esd 4.24–5.2, 6.14:
Target: 1In the second year of King Darius, on the first day of the sixth month, the word of theLordcame through the prophet Haggai to Zerubbabel son of Shealtiel, governor of Judah, and to Joshua son of Jozadak,#1:1HebrewJehozadak, a variant ofJozadak; also in verses 12 and 14the high priest:

Source: 1Dabid lé ɓuga mba̰ ləm, ndɔje ləa d’asee nag ləm tɔ ndá yeḛ unda ŋgonee gə́ Salomo̰ gə́ mbai lə Israɛlje#1Mb 1.1-40.
Target: 1When David was old and full of years, he made his son Solomon king over Israel.

Target: 1All night long on my bed

Target: 1After six days Jesus took with him Peter, James and John the brother of James, and led them up a high mountain by themselves.

Target: 1Then Jesus was led by the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted#4:1The Greek fortemptedcan also meantested.by the devil.

Source: 1Mbai Asuerus gaŋg nékoga-dɔ-rɔ dɔ deḛ gə́ d’isi mee ɓee’g ləm, gə dɔ deḛ gə́ d’isi dɔgoré-looje’g to dan baa-boo-kad’g ləm tɔ.
Target: 1King Xerxes imposed tribute throughout the empire, to its distant shores.

Source: 1Abrakam ḭ loo gə́ nee’g aw dɔ naŋg gə́ to par gə́ dɔkɔl. Yeḛ ra ɓee mbuna Kades gə sur’g ɓa yeḛ aw si Gerar tɔ.
Target: 1Now Abraham moved on from there into the region of the Negev and lived between Kadesh and Shur. For a while he stayed in Gerar,

Target: 1Then theLordsaid to Moses, “Go to Pharaoh and say to him, ‘This is what theLordsays: Let my people go, so that they may worship me.

Target: 1Then David said, “The house of theLordGod is to be here, and also the altar of burnt offering for Israel.”

Target: 1Come, let us sing for joy to theLord;

Target: 1TheLordsaid to Job:

Source: 1Mbai gə́ Arad gə́ to dəw gə́ Kana̰ gə́ sí par gə́ dɔkɔl lé oo ta lə Israɛlje to gə́ d’isi d’aw gə́ rəa’g gə rəw gə́ Atarim ndá yeḛ ḭ aw rɔ gə Israɛlje wa njé gə́ na̰je mbuna dee’g#BI 33.40.
Target: 1When the Canaanite king of Arad, who lived in the Negev, heard that Israel was coming along the road to Atharim, he attacked the Israelites and captured some of them.

Source: 1Kédé ɓa gə mba kar ndɔ ra naḭ Pag teḛ ɓəi lé Jeju gər gao, kàr kya̰ naŋg nee karee tel aw rɔ Bɔbee’g teḛ mba̰ ləm, yeḛ unda njékea̰je gə́ dɔ naŋg nee dan kəmee’g ləm tɔ ndá, yeḛ ra ne né gə́ doŋgɔ ar dee mba kar dɔ meenoji ləa mbata lə dee lé ɔr ne njal.
Target: 1It was just before the Passover Festival. Jesus knew that the hour had come for him to leave this world and go to the Father. Having loved his own who were in the world, he loved them to the end.

Target: 1But to Jonah this seemed very wrong, and he became angry.

Source: 1Mee ləb ko̰ɓee’g lə Sirus, mbai gə́ Persə gə́ njekɔm’g munda lé kəm Daniel gə́ d’unda ria lə Belsasar inja dɔ ta né gə́ to loo-kiya’g. Ta neelé to kankəmta gə́ wɔji dɔ boo-némeeko̰ gə́ a gə ree lé. Yeḛ la̰ji taree mée’g ndá yeḛ oo gin némḭdi lé njai-njai tɔ.
Target: 1In the third year of Cyrus king of Persia, a revelation was given to Daniel (who was called Belteshazzar). Its message was true and it concerned a great war.#10:1Ortrue and burdensomeThe understanding of the message came to him in a vision.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis pana: Maji kari aw rɔ Parao̰’g mbata m’ar mée-yeḛ gə meḛ kuraje ləa kara ndər mba kar nétɔjije ləm nduba ne rɔ dee mbuna dee’g gə́ raga.
Target: 1Then theLordsaid to Moses, “Go to Pharaoh, for I have hardened his heart and the hearts of his officials so that I may perform these signs of mine among them

Source: 1Israɛlje, maji kar sí ooje godnduje gə ndukunje gə́ ma m’ndoo sí lé. Maji kar sí raje née gə mba kar sí síje ne kəmba ləm, gə mba kar sí a̰dje ne mee ɓee gə́ Njesigənea̰ Ala lə bɔ síje ar sí gə́ né ka̰ sí lé ləm tɔ.
Target: 1Now, Israel, hear the decrees and laws I am about to teach you. Follow them so that you may live and may go in and take possession of the land theLord, the God of your ancestors, is giving you.

Source: 1Togə́bè Juje ɓar Rubḛje, gə Gadje, gə ges ginkoji Manasə tɔ.

Source: 1Aa ooje, godnduje gə́ seḭ a kundaje no̰ dee’g ɓa to nee#TtG 15.12-18:
Target: 1“These are the laws you are to set before them:

Source: 1Dabid, ula Njesigənea̰ ta gə pa neelé loo gə́ yeḛ ɔree ne ji njéba̰je’g ləa lai ləm, gə ji Sawul’g ləm tɔ.
Target: 1David sang to theLordthe words of this song when theLorddelivered him from the hand of all his enemies and from the hand of Saul.

Source: 1Ma gə́ m’isi daŋgai’g mbata Mbaidɔmbaije lé ma m’ndəji sí bər-bər mba kar néra sí wa bua kula gə́ yeḛ ɓar sí keneŋ.
Target: 1As a prisoner for the Lord, then, I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received.

Source: 1Samel, ŋgon basa lé ra kula lə Njesigənea̰ no̰ Eli’g. Mee ndəaje’g neelé Njesigənea̰ ula dəwje ta ta-ta el ləm, némḭdije kara teḛ ta-ta el ləm tɔ.
Target: 1The boy Samuel ministered before theLordunder Eli. In those days the word of theLordwas rare; there were not many visions.

Source: 1Deḛ d’aw gə Jisəb Ejiptə ndá Potipar, dəw gə́ Ejiptə gə́ to ɓé-njérɔje lə Parao̰ ləm, gə dəw dɔ njékaa dɔ Parao̰je ləm tɔ lé ndogee ji Ismaelje gə́ d’aw səa keneŋ lé.
Target: 1Now Joseph had been taken down to Egypt. Potiphar, an Egyptian who was one of Pharaoh’s officials, the captain of the guard, bought him from the Ishmaelites who had taken him there.

Source: 1Tɔɓəi ma m’oo maktub jikɔl yeḛ gə́ si dɔ kalimbai’g gə́ ndaŋg ta mée’g toroŋ ləm, gə giree’g toroŋ ləm tɔ. Maktub lé rḛdə təa loo-siri#Esa 29.11.
Target: 1Then I saw in the right hand of him who sat on the throne a scroll with writing on both sides and sealed with seven seals.

Source: 1Urje mbi sí ooje ta neelé,
Target: 1Hear this word, you cows of Bashan on Mount Samaria,

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Samel pana: See ndɔ gə́ ra ɓa i a kəw rɔi no̰ gə mba Sawul wa. Ma m’ubá m’yá̰ gə mba karee o̰ ɓee dɔ Israɛlje’g el ŋga. Ɔm ubu ku-gaji-da’g ləi aree rusu ndá aw: m’a kulai ɓee lə Isai, dəw gə́ Betlehem, mbata ma m’oo ŋgon kára gə́ mbuna ŋganeeje’g, yeḛ gə́ ma m’ndigi karee to mbai lé.
Target: 1TheLordsaid to Samuel, “How long will you mourn for Saul, since I have rejected him as king over Israel? Fill your horn with oil and be on your way; I am sending you to Jesse of Bethlehem. I have chosen one of his sons to be king.”

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis pana:
Target: 1TheLordsaid to Moses,

Source: 1Seḭ denéje lé maji kar sí tədjekag ŋgaw síje mba kar ɓó lé njé gə́ na̰je d’ila koji dɔ kankəmta’g neelé ndá néra gə́ maji lə denéje lə dee ɓa a kar dee d’ila ne koji dɔ’g ya. Ɓó lé seḭ a kula deeje ta gə́ raŋg kára el kara#Epe 5.22, Kol 3.18
Target: 1Wives, in the same way submit yourselves to your own husbands so that, if any of them do not believe the word, they may be won over without words by the behavior of their wives,

Target: 1Moses assembled the whole Israelite community and said to them, “These are the things theLordhas commanded you to do:

Target: 1At the end of every seven years you must cancel debts.

Source: 1Tɔgərɔ, néje lai neelé m’oo gə kəm ya ləm,
Target: 1“My eyes have seen all this,

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ pa togə́bè pana: Aw rɔ njekubajo’g aw ndogo səa jo. Ar ŋgatɔgje lə koso-dəwje ləm, gə ŋgatɔgje lə njékinjanéməsje ləm tɔ d’aw səi na̰’d.

Source: 1Loo gə́ dəwje joo ta oso mbuna dee’g ndá see ban ɓa yeḛ gə́ kára aw gə maree gə́ njetaamee-Kristi neelé no̰ njépole-magəje’g ɓa gə mba ra taree ɓó no̰ deḛ gə́ to gə kəmee’g el wa.
Target: 1If any of you has a dispute with another, do you dare to take it before the ungodly for judgment instead of before the Lord’s people?

Source: 1Jeju tuga loo aw dɔ mbal gə́ ria lə Koiyoje.
Target: 1but Jesus went to the Mount of Olives.

Source: 1Seḭ ginkoji dəwje gə́ rɔ sí kul el lé
Target: 1Gather together, gather yourselves together,

Source: 1Jeju tel andə aw mee kəi-kwa-dɔ-na̰’d lə dee ndá iŋga diŋgam kára keneŋ gə́ jia wəi kaaree’g wɔ.
Target: 1Another time Jesus went into the synagogue, and a man with a shriveled hand was there.

Source: 1Mee ləb gə́ njekɔm’g sɔ gə́ Jojakim, ŋgolə Jojias, mbai gə́ Juda o̰ ne ɓee lé Njesigənea̰ ula Jeremi ta gə rɔtaje nee pana#2Mb 24.1, 2SgI 36.5-7, LkD 1.1-2:
Target: 1In the fourth year of Jehoiakim son of Josiah king of Judah, this word came to Jeremiah from theLord:

Source: 1Dəw kára gə́ ria lə Kis gə́ to ŋgolə Abiel, gə́ to ŋgolə Seror, gə́ to ŋgolə Bekɔrat, gə́ to ŋgolə Apak, gə́ to ŋgolə dəw gə́ ginkoji’g lə Bḛjami lé si ɓee lə Bḛjamije. Yeḛ to dəw gə́ siŋgá to kɔgərɔ-kɔgərɔ ləm, yeḛ to dəw gə́ boo ləm tɔ.
Target: 1There was a Benjamite, a man of standing, whose name was Kish son of Abiel, the son of Zeror, the son of Bekorath, the son of Aphiah of Benjamin.

Source: 1Mee ndəa’g neelé Njesigənea̰ ulam pana: Tɔl bəgərə mbalje joo asəna gə njé gə́ kédé ndá ree ne rɔm’g ləm, gə́ ra sa̰duk-kag ləm tɔ#Tr 34.1-10.
Target: 1At that time theLordsaid to me, “Chisel out two stone tablets like the first ones and come up to me on the mountain. Also make a wooden ark.#10:1That is, a chest

Source: 1Moyis ilá keneŋ pana: Aa oo, d’a kɔm meḛ dee dɔm’g el ləm, d’a lel mbi dee koo ne ndum el ləm tɔ. Nɛ d’a pana: Njesigənea̰ teḛ dɔm’g el.
Target: 1Moses answered, “What if they do not believe me or listen to me and say, ‘TheLorddid not appear to you’?”

Source: 1Mee ləb ko̰ɓee’g lə Jojakim lé Nebukadnesar, mbai gə́ Babilɔn ɔr rɔ aw rɔ səa. Jojakim ula dəa nea̰’g as ləb munda ɓa yeḛ tel ḭ səa ɔsee rəw ɓəi#Jer 25.1-38, LkD 1.1-2.
Target: 1During Jehoiakim’s reign, Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon invaded the land, and Jehoiakim became his vassal for three years. But then he turned against Nebuchadnezzar and rebelled.

Source: 1I ŋgon-dəw lé maji kari tegginta wɔji ne dɔ Gɔg! A pana: Mbaidɔmbaije gə́ Njesigənea̰ pa togə́bè pana: Aa oo, i Gɔg, mbai gə́ njekaa dɔ dəb ɓeeko̰ gə́ Ros, gə Mesek, gə Tubal lé neḛ n’aw səi gə ta.
Target: 1“Son of man, prophesy against Gog and say: ‘This is what the SovereignLordsays: I am against you, Gog, chief prince of#39:1OrGog, prince of Rosh,Meshek and Tubal.

Source: 1Dabid ə̰ji mée’g pana: Ma neelé ndɔ kára ndá Sawul a tujim ya ɓəi. Né gə́ maji yaa̰ gə́ kəm ra ndá, kam m’aḭ m’aw mee ɓee’g lə Pilistije ɓa. Bèe ɓa Sawul a kya̰ goo korə gə́ yeḛ aw kɔrəm dɔ naŋg ɓee’g lə Israɛlje lé ya. Togə́bè ɓa m’a taa ne rɔm jia’g tɔ.
Target: 1But David thought to himself, “One of these days I will be destroyed by the hand of Saul. The best thing I can do is to escape to the land of the Philistines. Then Saul will give up searching for me anywhere in Israel, and I will slip out of his hand.”

Source: 1M’aa loo gərərə m’oo Ŋgonbad ɔr nérḛdə ta maktub gə́ kára, nékundaje lə Ala gə́ sɔ lé m’oo ndu gar dee gə́ kára mbuna dee’g pata gə ndia gə́ boi wəl asəna gə ndi gə́ ndaŋg pana: Maji kari gə́ ree!
Target: 1I watched as the Lamb opened the first of the seven seals. Then I heard one of the four living creatures say in a voice like thunder, “Come!”

Source: 1Juje mbo̰ ginkoji Israɛlje lai na̰’d mee ɓee gə́ Sikem ndá yeḛ ula kula ɓar ŋgatɔgje lə Israɛlje ləm, gə mbaije lə dee ləm, gə njégaŋ-rəwtaje lə dee ləma, gə ɓé-njérɔje lə dee ləm tɔ, ar dee ree d’aar no̰ Ala’g lé.
Target: 1Then Joshua assembled all the tribes of Israel at Shechem. He summoned the elders, leaders, judges and officials of Israel, and they presented themselves before God.

Source: 1Meeko̰ a koso dɔ Jerusalem’g,
Target: 1Woe to the city of oppressors,

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ulam ta gə rɔtaje nee pana:

Source: 1Goo ləb gə́ sigi’g lé to mee ndəaje gə́ mbaije d’aw mba rɔ ne gə na̰ na̰ lé ndá Dabid ula Joab gə kuraje ləa gə njérɔje gə́ Israɛl lai mba kar dee d’aw tuji Amo̰je ləm, gə mba kaḭ dɔ Raba sub gə rɔ ləm tɔ. Nɛ Dabid nai Jerusalem ya#1SgI 20.1.
Target: 1In the spring, at the time when kings go off to war, David sent Joab out with the king’s men and the whole Israelite army. They destroyed the Ammonites and besieged Rabbah. But David remained in Jerusalem.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ula Moyis
Target: 1TheLordsaid to Moses,

Source: 1Ləb gə́ njekɔm’g sɔ gə́ Jojakim, ŋgolə Jojias, mbai gə́ Juda o̰ ne ɓee lé ta oso mbi Jeremi’g wɔji ne dɔ koso-dəwje gə́ Juda lai. To mee ləb gə́ dɔtar gə́ Nebukadnesar to ne mbai gə́ Babilɔn lé#2Mb 24.1, 2SgI 36.5-7, LkD 1.1-2.
Target: 1The word came to Jeremiah concerning all the people of Judah in the fourth year of Jehoiakim son of Josiah king of Judah, which was the first year of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon.

Source: 1Mee ndəaje’g neelé Sesar Auguste un ndia mba kar dee tura dəwje lai-lai dɔ naŋg nee kunda ne ri dee mee maktub-tura-dəwje’g.
Target: 1In those days Caesar Augustus issued a decree that a census should be taken of the entire Roman world.

Source: 1Jɔb un ta tɔɓəi pa gə gosota pana:
Target: 1And Job continued his discourse:

Target: 1This is the word theLordspoke through Jeremiah the prophet concerning Babylon and the land of the Babylonians#50:1OrChaldeans; also in verses 8, 25, 35 and 45:

Source: 1Pakɔs kḭ kaw tuga ne loo ɗao-ɗao gə́ tar. Ka̰ Dabid.
Target: 1I rejoiced with those who said to me,

Source: 1Njesigənea̰, Ala gə́ njedalba̰ lé!
Target: 1TheLordis a God who avenges.

Source: 1Seḭ Israɛlje lé maji kar sí ooje maji! Ɓogənè seḭ a gə gaŋgje baa gə́ Jurdɛ̰, gə mba tuba ne ginkoji dəwje gə raŋg gə́ bula d’unda sí ləm, siŋga dee ur dɔ sí’g ləm tɔ, seḭ a gə taaje ɓee-booje gə́ boi gə́ ndògo-bɔrɔ gə́ keneŋ aw saar mee dara’g,
Target: 1Hear, Israel: You are now about to cross the Jordan to go in and dispossess nations greater and stronger than you, with large cities that have walls up to the sky.

Target: 1Woe to you who are complacent in Zion,

Target: 1In the fourth year of King Darius, the word of theLordcame to Zechariah on the fourth day of the ninth month, the month of Kislev.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ar mée olé dɔ ta gə́ yeḛ ula Sara’g ndá Njesigənea̰ ra gə Sara né gə́ yeḛ un ne ndia aree lé tɔ.
Target: 1Now theLordwas gracious to Sarah as he had said, and theLorddid for Sarah what he had promised.

Source: 1Dabid ḭ Najot gə́ to mbɔr Rama’g lé aḭ. Yeḛ aw iŋga Jonatan dəjee pana: See ɗi ɓa m’ra wa. Néram gə́ gə goo rəbee el lé to ɗi wa. See kaiya ɗi ɓa m’ra kəm bɔbije’g ɓa yeḛ ndigi kam m’udu ne wa.
Target: 1Then David fled from Naioth at Ramah and went to Jonathan and asked, “What have I done? What is my crime? How have I wronged your father, that he is trying to kill me?”

Source: 1Koré, ŋgolə Jisəar, gə́ to ŋgolə Keat, gə́ to ŋgolə Ləbi, deḛ gə Datan gə Abiram, ŋgalə Eliab ləm, gə Ɔn, ŋgolə Pelet, deḛ munda gə́ to Rubḛje lé#Jud 11
Target: 1Korah son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the son of Levi, and certain Reubenites—Dathan and Abiram, sons of Eliab, and On son of Peleth—became insolent#16:1OrPeleth—took men

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ lé o̰ ɓee,
Target: 1TheLordreigns, let the earth be glad;

Source: 1Jeju si dəs tar, nɛ aa loo oo dəw kára gə́ d’ojee gə́ njekəmtɔ.
Target: 1As he went along, he saw a man blind from birth.

Source: 1Nékinjaməs gə́ seḭ a kinjaje karje Ala lə sí gə́ Njesigənea̰ lé, maŋg əsé ŋgon badə gə́ rəa ya̰ maree əsé to gə́ njemədə lé seḭ a kḭjáje kaareeje el mbata a to né gə́ mina̰ kəm Njesigənea̰ Ala’g lə sí.
Target: 1Do not sacrifice to theLordyour God an ox or a sheep that has any defect or flaw in it, for that would be detestable to him.

Source: 1To gə́ ləw ba, njéteggintaje gə́ ŋgɔm d’isi mbuna dəwje’g lé togə́bè ɓa njékɔrginta gə́ ŋgɔmje d’a kandə mbuna sí-seḭ’g bèe tɔ. D’a kun ta gə goo ŋgəḭ ndoo sí ne taje gə́ kori-kori gə́ a gə tuji sí ləm, deḛ nja d’a mbad mbai gə́ njekoga dɔ dee lé ɓar ne tuji dɔ dee’g karee uba dee naŋg bus ləm tɔ.
Target: 1But there were also false prophets among the people, just as there will be false teachers among you. They will secretly introduce destructive heresies, even denying the sovereign Lord who bought them—bringing swift destruction on themselves.

Source: 1Goo néje’g neelé Absalɔm iŋga pusu-rɔ kára ləm gə kundaje ləm gə dəwje rɔ-mi gə́ to njé k’aḭ nea̰’gje ləm tɔ.
Target: 1In the course of time, Absalom provided himself with a chariot and horses and with fifty men to run ahead of him.

Source: 1Mee ləb’g neelé Herɔdə, mbai lé ḭ ula kəm barkəm Eglisəje gə́ na̰je ndòo.
Target: 1It was about this time that King Herod arrested some who belonged to the church, intending to persecute them.

Source: 1Moyis gə ŋgatɔgje gə́ Israɛl gə́ d’aar səa lé d’un ndukun nee d’ar koso-dəwje pana: Maji kar sí aaje dɔ tornduje lai gə́ ma m’un m’ar sí ɓogənè lé.
Target: 1Moses and the elders of Israel commanded the people: “Keep all these commands that I give you today.

Source: 1Yeḛ gə́ unda rəa ŋgərəŋ lé
Target: 1An unfriendly person pursues selfish ends

Source: 1Aa ooje, Bɔ-dəwje lé ndigi sí gə mée gə́ ɔr jol-jol ɓa gə mba kar dee ɓar sí ne ŋgan-Alaje. Tɔgərɔ jeḛ n’to gə́ ŋganeeje ya. Ɓó lé dəwje gə́ dɔ naŋg nee gər sí gə́ ŋganeeje el ndá to mbata deḛ gəree-yeḛ el tɔ#Ja̰ 1.12.
Target: 1See what great love the Father has lavished on us, that we should be called children of God! And that is what we are! The reason the world does not know us is that it did not know him.

Source: 1Kəmə ləm si godo,
Target: 1My spirit is broken,

Source: 1Loo gə́ Dabid tɔl ta gə́ yeḛ wɔji gə Sawul bém ndá léegəneeya Jonatan ɔm mée na̰’d gə Dabid. Jonatan ndigee to gə́ yeḛ ndigi ne darəa-yeḛ bèe.
Target: 1After David had finished talking with Saul, Jonathan became one in spirit with David, and he loved him as himself.

Source: 1Tapaje lə mbai Lemuel. Ndərtaje gə́ kea̰je ndée lé.
Target: 1The sayings of King Lemuel—an inspired utterance his mother taught him.

Source: 1Loo gə́ Ŋgonbad lé ɔr nérḛdə ta maktub gə́ njekɔm’g siri lé ndá kaa mbi loo gə́ dara pa doi gə kuree ɗegəse ya.
Target: 1When he opened the seventh seal, there was silence in heaven for about half an hour.

Source: 1Ma ŋgon-dəw lé maji kam m’un né gə́ adə làm-làm to gə́ yiŋga lə njḛdisa mbaita bèe, m’un m’ndisa ne dɔm gə mbaitam. Tɔɓəi maji kam m’un nékwɔji-kwɔi lə néje m’kai ne yiŋga lé loo munda.
Target: 1“Now, son of man, take a sharp sword and use it as a barber’s razor to shave your head and your beard. Then take a set of scales and divide up the hair.

Source: 1Aa ooje, ginkoji dəwje gə raŋg gə́ Njesigənea̰ ya̰ dee mba kaḭ ne meḛ Israɛlje gə́ d’oo loo-rɔje gə́ Kana̰ el lé ɓa nee.
Target: 1These are the nations theLordleft to test all those Israelites who had not experienced any of the wars in Canaan

Source: 1Dəw kára kara a to gə dené lə bɔbeeje el, mbata to gə́ sul ɓa yeḛ ula dɔ bɔbeeje’g tɔ#Ləb 18.8, 20.11, TtG 27.20.
Target: 1No one who has been emasculated by crushing or cutting may enter the assembly of theLord.

Source: 1Pilistije mbo̰ kudu-njérɔje lə deḛ lai Apek ndá Israɛlje d’wa loo-si dee mbɔr kəm-rəw-mán gə́ Jisreel dəb tɔ.
Target: 1The Philistines gathered all their forces at Aphek, and Israel camped by the spring in Jezreel.

Target: 1A prophecy concerning Nineveh. The book of the vision of Nahum the Elkoshite.

Source: 1Ta gə́ wɔji dɔ nénoji gə́ seḭ mbo̰je mbata njémeendaje lé maji kar sí-seḭ kara raje gə goo rəbee gə́ ma m’tɔji Eglisəje gə́ dəb ɓeeko̰ gə́ Galati tɔ#Rɔm 15.25-26.
Target: 1Now about the collection for the Lord’s people: Do what I told the Galatian churches to do.

Source: 1Njesigənea̰ ulam ta gə rɔtaje nee pana:
